94// cap JACK requirements to support arbitrarily large vehicles
95static double jack_quality( const vehicle &veh )
96{
97 const units::quantity<double, units::mass::unit_type> mass = std::min( veh.total_mass(),
98 JACK_LIMIT );
99 return std::ceil( mass / TOOL_LIFT_FACTOR );
100}

105 return pt.can_reload();

111player_activity veh_interact::serialize_activity()
112{
113 const auto *pt = sel_vehicle_part;
114 const auto *vp = sel_vpart_info;
115
116 if( sel_cmd == 'q' || sel_cmd == ' ' || !vp ) {
117 return player_activity();
118 }
119
120 int time = 1000;
121 switch( sel_cmd ) {
122 case 'i':
123 time = vp->install_time( g->u );
124 break;
125 case 'r':
126 if( pt != nullptr ) {
127 if( pt->is_broken() ) {
128 time = vp->install_time( g->u );
129 } else if( pt->base.max_damage() > 0 ) {
130 time = vp->repair_time( g->u ) * pt->base.damage() / pt->base.max_damage();
131 }
132 }
133 break;
134 case 'o':
135 time = vp->removal_time( g->u );
136 break;
137 default:
138 break;
139 }
140 if( g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
141 time = 1;
142 }
143 player_activity res( ACT_VEHICLE, time, static_cast<int>( sel_cmd ) );
144
145 // if we're working on an existing part, use that part as the reference point
146 // otherwise (e.g. installing a new frame), just use part 0
147 const point q = veh->coord_translate( pt ? pt->mount : veh->part( 0 ).mount );
148 const vehicle_part *vpt = pt ? pt : &veh->part( 0 );
149 for( const tripoint &p : veh->get_points( true ) ) {
150 res.coord_set.insert( g->m.getabs( p ) );
151 }
152 res.values.push_back( g->m.getabs( veh->global_pos3() ).x + q.x ); // values[0]
153 res.values.push_back( g->m.getabs( veh->global_pos3() ).y + q.y ); // values[1]
154 res.values.push_back( dd.x ); // values[2]
155 res.values.push_back( dd.y ); // values[3]
156 res.values.push_back( -dd.x ); // values[4]
157 res.values.push_back( -dd.y ); // values[5]
158 res.values.push_back( veh->index_of_part( vpt ) ); // values[6]
159 res.str_values.push_back( vp->get_id().str() );
160 res.targets.emplace_back( std::move( target ) );
161
162 return res;
163}
164
165player_activity veh_interact::run( vehicle &veh, const point &p )
166{
167 veh_interact vehint( veh, p );
168 vehint.do_main_loop();
169 return vehint.serialize_activity();
170}

172vehicle_part &veh_interact::select_part( const vehicle &veh, const part_selector &sel,
173 const std::string &title )
174{
175 static vehicle_part null_part;
176 vehicle_part *res = &null_part;
177
178 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
179 res = const_cast<vehicle_part *>( &pt );
180 };
181 std::function<bool( const vpart_reference & )> sel_wrapper = [sel]( const vpart_reference & vpr ) {
182 return sel( vpr.part() );
183 };
184
185 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh.get_all_parts();
186 int opts = std::count_if( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), sel_wrapper );
187
188 if( opts == 1 ) {
189 act( std::find_if( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), sel_wrapper )->part() );
190
191 } else if( opts != 0 ) {
192 veh_interact vehint( const_cast<vehicle &>( veh ) );
193 vehint.title = title.empty() ? _( "Select part" ) : title;
194 vehint.overview( sel, act );
195 }
196
197 return *res;
198}

203veh_interact::veh_interact( vehicle &veh, const point &p )
204 : dd( p ), veh( &veh ), main_context( "VEH_INTERACT" )
205{
206 // Only build the shapes map and the wheel list once

208 const vpart_info &vp = e.second;
209 vpart_shapes[ vp.name() + vp.item.str() ].push_back( &vp );
210 if( vp.has_flag( "WHEEL" ) ) {
211 wheel_types.push_back( &vp );
212 }
213 }
214
215 main_context.register_directions();
216 main_context.register_action( "QUIT" );
217 main_context.register_action( "INSTALL" );
218 main_context.register_action( "REPAIR" );
219 main_context.register_action( "MEND" );
220 main_context.register_action( "REFILL" );
221 main_context.register_action( "REMOVE" );
222 main_context.register_action( "RENAME" );
223 main_context.register_action( "SIPHON" );
224 main_context.register_action( "UNLOAD" );
225 main_context.register_action( "ASSIGN_CREW" );
226 main_context.register_action( "CHANGE_SHAPE" );
227 main_context.register_action( "RELABEL" );
228 main_context.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
229 main_context.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
230 main_context.register_action( "OVERVIEW_DOWN" );
231 main_context.register_action( "OVERVIEW_UP" );
232 main_context.register_action( "FUEL_LIST_DOWN" );
233 main_context.register_action( "FUEL_LIST_UP" );
234 main_context.register_action( "DESC_LIST_DOWN" );
235 main_context.register_action( "DESC_LIST_UP" );
236 main_context.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
237 main_context.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
238 main_context.register_action( "FILTER" );
239 main_context.register_action( "ANY_INPUT" );
240
241 count_durability();
242 cache_tool_availability();
243 // Initialize info of selected parts
244 move_cursor( point_zero );
245}

249void veh_interact::allocate_windows()
250{
251 // grid window
252 const point grid( point_south_east );
253 const int grid_w = TERMX - 2; // exterior borders take 2
254 const int grid_h = TERMY - 2; // exterior borders take 2
255
256 const int mode_h = 1;
257 const int name_h = 1;
258
259 page_size = grid_h - ( mode_h + stats_h + name_h ) - 2;
260
261 const int pane_y = grid.y + mode_h + 1;
262
263 const int pane_w = ( grid_w / 3 ) - 1;
264
265 const int disp_w = grid_w - ( pane_w * 2 ) - 2;
266 const int disp_h = page_size * 0.45;
267 const int parts_h = page_size - disp_h;
268 const int parts_y = pane_y + disp_h;
269
270 const int name_y = pane_y + page_size + 1;
271 const int stats_y = name_y + name_h;
272
273 const int list_x = grid.x + disp_w + 1;
274 const int msg_x = list_x + pane_w + 1;
275
276 // covers right part of w_name and w_stats in vertical/hybrid
277 const int details_y = name_y;
278 const int details_x = list_x;
279
280 const int details_h = 7;
281 const int details_w = grid.x + grid_w - details_x;
282
283 // make the windows
284 w_border = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
285 w_mode = catacurses::newwin( mode_h, grid_w, grid );
286 w_msg = catacurses::newwin( page_size, pane_w, point( msg_x, pane_y ) );
287 w_disp = catacurses::newwin( disp_h, disp_w, point( grid.x, pane_y ) );
288 w_parts = catacurses::newwin( parts_h, disp_w, point( grid.x, parts_y ) );
289 w_list = catacurses::newwin( page_size, pane_w, point( list_x, pane_y ) );
290 w_stats = catacurses::newwin( stats_h, grid_w, point( grid.x, stats_y ) );
291 w_name = catacurses::newwin( name_h, grid_w, point( grid.x, name_y ) );
292 w_details = catacurses::newwin( details_h, details_w, point( details_x, details_y ) );
293}

295bool veh_interact::format_reqs( std::string &msg, const requirement_data &reqs,
296 const std::map<skill_id, int> &skills, int moves ) const
297{
298 const inventory &inv = g->u.crafting_inventory();
299 bool ok = reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
300
301 msg += _( "<color_white>Time required:</color>\n" );
302 // TODO: better have a from_moves function
303 msg += "> " + to_string_approx( time_duration::from_turns( moves / 100 ) ) + "\n";
304
305 msg += _( "<color_white>Skills required:</color>\n" );
306 for( const auto &e : skills ) {
307 bool hasSkill = g->u.get_skill_level( e.first ) >= e.second;
308 if( !hasSkill ) {
309 ok = false;
310 }
311 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is skill name, and %3$i is skill level
312 msg += string_format( _( "> %1$s%2$s %3$i</color>\n" ), status_color( hasSkill ),
313 e.first.obj().name(), e.second );
314 }
315 if( skills.empty() ) {
316 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is the word "NONE"
317 msg += string_format( "> %1$s%2$s</color>", status_color( true ), _( "NONE" ) ) + "\n";
318 }
319
320 auto comps = reqs.get_folded_components_list( getmaxx( w_msg ) - 2, c_white, inv,
321 is_crafting_component );
322 for( const std::string &line : comps ) {
323 msg += line + "\n";
324 }
325 auto tools = reqs.get_folded_tools_list( getmaxx( w_msg ) - 2, c_white, inv );
326 for( const std::string &line : tools ) {
327 msg += line + "\n";
328 }
329
330 return ok;
331}

341shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> veh_interact::create_or_get_ui_adaptor()
342{
343 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = ui.lock();
344 if( !current_ui ) {
345 ui = current_ui = make_shared_fast<ui_adaptor>();
346 current_ui->on_screen_resize( [this]( ui_adaptor & current_ui ) {
347 if( ui_hidden ) {
348 current_ui.position( point_zero, point_zero );
349 return;
350 }
351 allocate_windows();
352 current_ui.position_from_window( catacurses::stdscr );
353 } );
354 current_ui->mark_resize();
355 current_ui->on_redraw( [this]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
356 if( ui_hidden ) {
357 return;
358 }
359 display_grid();
360 display_name();
361 display_stats();
362 display_veh();
363
364 werase( w_parts );
365 veh->print_part_list( w_parts, 0, getmaxy( w_parts ) - 1, getmaxx( w_parts ), cpart, highlight_part,
366 true );
367 wnoutrefresh( w_parts );
368
369 werase( w_msg );
370 if( !msg.has_value() ) {
371 veh->print_vparts_descs( w_msg, getmaxy( w_msg ), getmaxx( w_msg ), cpart, start_at, start_limit );
372 } else {
373 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
374 fold_and_print( w_msg, point( 1, 0 ), getmaxx( w_msg ) - 2, c_light_red, msg.value() );
375 }
376 wnoutrefresh( w_msg );
377
378 if( install_info ) {
379 display_list( install_info->pos, install_info->tab_vparts, 2 );
380 display_details( sel_vpart_info );
381 } else {
382 display_overview();
383 }
384 display_mode();
385 } );
386 }
387 return current_ui;
388}

392 if( hide != ui_hidden ) {
393 ui_hidden = hide;
394 create_or_get_ui_adaptor()->mark_resize();

398void veh_interact::do_main_loop()
399{
400 bool finish = false;
401 const bool owned_by_player = veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ), true );
402 faction *owner_fac;
403 if( veh->has_owner() ) {
404 owner_fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( veh->get_owner() );
405 } else {
406 owner_fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( faction_id( "no_faction" ) );
407 }
408
409 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
410
411 while( !finish ) {
412 calc_overview();
413 ui_manager::redraw();
414 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
415 msg.reset();
416 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> vec = main_context.get_direction( action ) ) {
417 move_cursor( vec->xy() );
418 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
419 finish = true;
420 } else if( action == "INSTALL" ) {
421 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
422 do_install();
423 }
424 } else if( action == "REPAIR" ) {
425 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
426 do_repair();
427 }
428 } else if( action == "MEND" ) {
429 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
430 do_mend();
431 }
432 } else if( action == "REFILL" ) {
433 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
434 do_refill();
435 }
436 } else if( action == "REMOVE" ) {
437 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
438 do_remove();
439 }
440 } else if( action == "RENAME" ) {
441 if( owned_by_player ) {
442 do_rename();
443 } else {
444 if( owner_fac ) {
445 popup( _( "You cannot rename this vehicle as it is owned by: %s." ), _( owner_fac->name ) );
446 }
447 }
448 } else if( action == "SIPHON" ) {
449 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
450 do_siphon();
451 // Siphoning may have started a player activity. If so, we should close the
452 // vehicle dialog and continue with the activity.
453 finish = !g->u.activity.is_null();
454 if( !finish ) {
455 // it's possible we just invalidated our crafting inventory
456 cache_tool_availability();
457 }
458 }
459 } else if( action == "UNLOAD" ) {
460 if( veh->handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( g->u ) ) ) {
461 finish = do_unload();
462 }
463 } else if( action == "CHANGE_SHAPE" ) {
464 // purely cosmetic
465 do_change_shape();
466 } else if( action == "ASSIGN_CREW" ) {
467 if( owned_by_player ) {
468 do_assign_crew();
469 } else {
470 if( owner_fac ) {
471 popup( _( "You cannot assign crew on this vehicle as it is owned by: %s." ),
472 _( owner_fac->name ) );
473 }
474 }
475 } else if( action == "RELABEL" ) {
476 if( owned_by_player ) {
477 do_relabel();
478 } else {
479 if( owner_fac ) {
480 popup( _( "You cannot relabel this vehicle as it is owned by: %s." ), _( owner_fac->name ) );
481 }
482 }
483 } else if( action == "FUEL_LIST_DOWN" ) {
484 move_fuel_cursor( 1 );
485 } else if( action == "FUEL_LIST_UP" ) {
486 move_fuel_cursor( -1 );
487 } else if( action == "OVERVIEW_DOWN" ) {
488 move_overview_line( 1 );
489 } else if( action == "OVERVIEW_UP" ) {
490 move_overview_line( -1 );
491 } else if( action == "DESC_LIST_DOWN" ) {
492 move_cursor( point_zero, 1 );
493 } else if( action == "DESC_LIST_UP" ) {
494 move_cursor( point_zero, -1 );
495 }
496 if( sel_cmd != ' ' ) {
497 finish = true;
498 }
499 }
500}
501
502void veh_interact::cache_tool_availability()
503{
504 crafting_inv = g->u.crafting_inventory();
505
506 cache_tool_availability_update_lifting( g->u.pos() );
507 int mech_jack = 0;
508 if( g->u.is_mounted() ) {
509 mech_jack = g->u.mounted_creature->mech_str_addition() + 10;
510 }
511 max_jack = std::max( { g->u.max_quality( qual_JACK ), mech_jack,
512 map_selector( g->u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE, false ).max_quality( qual_JACK ),
513 vehicle_selector( g->u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE, false, *veh ).max_quality( qual_JACK )
514 } );
515}
516
517void veh_interact::cache_tool_availability_update_lifting( const tripoint &world_cursor_pos )
518{
519 max_lift = g->u.best_nearby_lifting_assist( world_cursor_pos );
520}

522/**
523 * Checks if the player is able to perform some command, and returns a nonzero
524 * error code if they are unable to perform it. The return from this function
525 * should be passed into the various do_whatever functions further down.
526 * @param mode The command the player is trying to perform (i.e. 'r' for repair).
527 * @return CAN_DO if the player has everything they need,
528 * INVALID_TARGET if the command can't target that square,
529 * LACK_TOOLS if the player lacks tools,
530 * NOT_FREE if something else obstructs the action,
531 * LACK_SKILL if the player's skill isn't high enough,
532 * LOW_MORALE if the player's morale is too low while trying to perform
533 * an action requiring a minimum morale,
534 * UNKNOWN_TASK if the requested operation is unrecognized.
535 */
536task_reason veh_interact::cant_do( char mode )
537{
538 bool enough_morale = true;
539 bool valid_target = false;
540 bool has_tools = false;
541 bool part_free = true;
542 bool has_skill = true;
543 bool enough_light = true;
544 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh->get_all_parts();
545 switch( mode ) {
546 case 'i':
547 // install mode
548 enough_morale = g->u.has_morale_to_craft();
549 valid_target = !can_mount.empty() && 0 == veh->tags.count( "convertible" );
550 //tool checks processed later
551 enough_light = g->u.fine_detail_vision_mod() <= 4;
552 has_tools = true;
553 break;
554
555 case 'r':
556 // repair mode
557 enough_morale = g->u.has_morale_to_craft();
558 valid_target = !need_repair.empty() && cpart >= 0;
559 // checked later
560 has_tools = true;
561 enough_light = g->u.fine_detail_vision_mod() <= 4;
562 break;
563
564 case 'm': {
565 // mend mode
566 enough_morale = g->u.has_morale_to_craft();
567 const bool toggling = g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
568 valid_target = std::any_of( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), [toggling]( const vpart_reference & pt ) {
569 if( toggling ) {
570 return pt.part().is_available() && !pt.part().faults_potential().empty();
571 } else {
572 return pt.part().is_available() && !pt.part().faults().empty();
573 }
574 } );
575 enough_light = g->u.fine_detail_vision_mod() <= 4;
576 // checked later
577 has_tools = true;
578 }
579 break;
580
581 case 'f':
582 valid_target = std::any_of( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), []( const vpart_reference & pt ) {
583 return can_refill( pt.part() );
584 } );
585 has_tools = true;
586 break;
587
588 case 'o':
589 // remove mode
590 enough_morale = g->u.has_morale_to_craft();
591 valid_target = cpart >= 0 && 0 == veh->tags.count( "convertible" );
592 part_free = parts_here.size() > 1 || ( cpart >= 0 && veh->can_unmount( cpart ) );
593 //tool and skill checks processed later
594 has_tools = true;
595 has_skill = true;
596 enough_light = g->u.fine_detail_vision_mod() <= 4;
597 break;
598
599 case 's':
600 // siphon mode
601 valid_target = false;
602 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_any_parts( VPFLAG_FLUIDTANK ) ) {
603 if( vp.part().base.contents_made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
604 valid_target = true;
605 break;
606 }
607 }
608 has_tools = g->u.has_quality( qual_HOSE );
609 break;
610
611 case 'd':
612 // unload mode
613 valid_target = false;
614 has_tools = true;
615 for( auto &e : veh->fuels_left() ) {
616 if( e.first != fuel_type_battery && e.first->phase == SOLID ) {
617 valid_target = true;
618 break;
619 }
620 }
621 break;
622
623 case 'w':
624 // assign crew
625 if( g->allies().empty() ) {
626 return INVALID_TARGET;
627 }
628 return std::any_of( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), []( const vpart_reference & e ) {
629 return e.part().is_seat();
630 } ) ? CAN_DO : INVALID_TARGET;
631
632 case 'p': {
633 // Change part shape
634 has_tools = true;
635
636 if( cpart >= 0 ) {
637 const int displayed_part = veh->part_displayed_at( veh->part( cpart ).mount );
638 const vpart_info &displayed_vpart = veh->part( displayed_part ).info();
639 // Does the displayed part have different shapes?
640 valid_target = vpart_shapes[displayed_vpart.name() + displayed_vpart.item.str()].size() > 1;
641 }
642 break;
643 }
644 case 'a':
645 // relabel
646 valid_target = cpart >= 0;
647 has_tools = true;
648 break;
649 default:
650 return UNKNOWN_TASK;
651 }
652
653 if( std::abs( veh->velocity ) > 100 || g->u.controlling_vehicle ) {
654 return MOVING_VEHICLE;
655 }
656 if( !valid_target ) {
657 return INVALID_TARGET;
658 }
659 if( !enough_morale ) {
660 return LOW_MORALE;
661 }
662 if( !enough_light ) {
663 return LOW_LIGHT;
664 }
665 if( !has_tools ) {
666 return LACK_TOOLS;
667 }
668 if( !part_free ) {
669 return NOT_FREE;
670 }
671 // TODO: that is always false!
672 if( !has_skill ) {
673 return LACK_SKILL;
674 }
675 return CAN_DO;
676}
677
678bool veh_interact::is_drive_conflict()
679{
680 std::string conflict_type;
681 bool has_conflict = veh->has_engine_conflict( sel_vpart_info, conflict_type );
682
683 if( has_conflict ) {
684 //~ %1$s is fuel_type
685 msg = string_format( _( "Only one %1$s powered engine can be installed." ),
686 conflict_type );
687 }
688 return has_conflict;
689}
690
691bool veh_interact::can_self_jack()
692{
693 int lvl = jack_quality( *veh );
694
695 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_avail_parts( "SELF_JACK" ) ) {
696 if( vp.part().base.has_quality( qual_SELF_JACK, lvl ) ) {
697 return true;
698 }
699 }
700 return false;
701}
702
703bool veh_interact::update_part_requirements()
704{
705 if( sel_vpart_info == nullptr ) {
706 return false;
707 }
708
709 if( is_drive_conflict() ) {
710 return false;
711 }
712 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "FUNNEL" ) ) {
713 if( std::none_of( parts_here.begin(), parts_here.end(), [&]( const int e ) {
714 return veh->part( e ).is_tank();
715 } ) ) {
716 msg = _( "Funnels need to be installed over a tank." );
717 return false;
718 }
719 }
720
721 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "TURRET" ) ) {
722 if( std::any_of( parts_here.begin(), parts_here.end(), [&]( const int e ) {
723 return veh->part( e ).is_turret();
724 } ) ) {
725 msg = _( "Can't install turret on another turret." );
726 return false;
727 }
728 }
729
730 const auto get_rq_mechanics = []( const vpart_info & vpi ) {
731 for( const std::pair<const skill_id, int> &it : vpi.install_skills ) {
732 if( it.first == skill_mechanics ) {
733 return it.second;
734 }
735 }
736 return 0;
737 };
738
739 // Difficulty of installing additional engines depends on most complex
740 // installed engine and # of installed engines,
741 // but can never be less than 6 or more than 10.
742 // Engines without E_HIGHER_SKILL flag are excluded from the check.
743 bool is_engine = sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "ENGINE" );
744 int dif_eng = 0;
745 if( is_engine && sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "E_HIGHER_SKILL" ) ) {
746 int engines = 0;
747 int dif_max = get_rq_mechanics( *sel_vpart_info );
748 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_avail_parts( "ENGINE" ) ) {
749 if( vp.has_feature( "E_HIGHER_SKILL" ) ) {
750 engines++;
751 dif_max = std::max( dif_max, get_rq_mechanics( vp.info() ) );
752 }
753 }
754 if( engines > 0 ) {
755 int lvl = std::max( 6, dif_max + 3 );
756 dif_eng = std::min( 10, lvl + ( engines - 1 ) * 2 );
757 }
758 }
759
760 int dif_steering = 0;
761 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "STEERABLE" ) ) {
762 std::set<int> axles;
763 for( auto &p : veh->steering ) {
764 if( !veh->part_flag( p, "TRACKED" ) ) {
765 // tracked parts don't contribute to axle complexity
766 axles.insert( veh->part( p ).mount.x );
767 }
768 }
769
770 if( !axles.empty() && axles.count( -dd.x ) == 0 ) {
771 // Installing more than one steerable axle is hard
772 // (but adding a wheel to an existing axle isn't)
773 dif_steering = axles.size() + 5;
774 }
775 }
776
777 const auto reqs = sel_vpart_info->install_requirements();
778
779 std::string nmsg;
780 bool ok = format_reqs( nmsg, reqs, sel_vpart_info->install_skills,
781 sel_vpart_info->install_time( g->u ) );
782
783 std::string additional_requirements;
784 bool lifting_or_jacking_required = false;
785
786 if( dif_eng > 0 ) {
787 if( g->u.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) < dif_eng ) {
788 ok = false;
789 }
790 additional_requirements += string_format(
791 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated,
792 //~ %2$s is skill name, and %3$i is skill level
793 _( "> %1$s%2$s %3$i</color> to install alongside other engines." ),
794 status_color( g->u.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) >= dif_eng ),
795 skill_mechanics.obj().name(), dif_eng ) + "\n";
796 }
797
798 if( dif_steering > 0 ) {
799 if( g->u.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) < dif_steering ) {
800 ok = false;
801 }
802 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is skill name, and %3$i is skill level
803 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s%2$s %3$i</color> for extra steering axles." ),
804 status_color( g->u.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) >= dif_steering ),
805 skill_mechanics.obj().name(), dif_steering ) + "\n";
806 }
807
808 int lvl = 0;
809 int str = 0;
810 quality_id qual;
811 bool use_aid = false;
812 bool use_str = false;
813 item base( sel_vpart_info->item );
814 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NEEDS_JACKING" ) ) {
815 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
816 qual = qual_JACK;
817 lvl = jack_quality( *veh );
818 str = veh->lift_strength();
819 use_aid = ( max_jack >= lvl ) || can_self_jack();
820 use_str = g->u.can_lift( str );
821 } else if( get_option<bool>( "DISABLE_LIFTING" ) || sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NO_LIFT_REQ" ) ) {
822 use_aid = true;
823 use_str = true;
824 } else {
825 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
826 qual = qual_LIFT;
827 lvl = std::ceil( units::quantity<double, units::mass::unit_type>( base.weight() ) /
828 TOOL_LIFT_FACTOR );
829 str = base.lift_strength();
830 use_aid = max_lift >= lvl;
831 use_str = g->u.can_lift( base.lift_strength() );
832 }
833
834 if( !( use_aid || use_str ) ) {
835 ok = false;
836 }
837
838 nc_color aid_color = use_aid ? c_green : ( use_str ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
839 nc_color str_color = use_str ? c_green : ( use_aid ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
840
841 const auto helpers = g->u.get_crafting_helpers();
842 std::string str_string;
843 if( lifting_or_jacking_required ) {
844 if( !helpers.empty() ) {
845 str_string = string_format( _( "strength ( assisted ) %d" ), str );
846 } else {
847 str_string = string_format( _( "strength %d" ), str );
848 }
849
850 //~ %1$s is quality name, %2$d is quality level
851 std::string aid_string = string_format( _( "1 tool with %1$s %2$d" ),
852 qual.obj().name, lvl );
853 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s <color_white>OR</color> %2$s" ),
854 colorize( aid_string, aid_color ),
855 colorize( str_string, str_color ) ) + "\n";
856 }
857 if( !additional_requirements.empty() ) {
858 nmsg += _( "<color_white>Additional requirements:</color>\n" );
859 nmsg += additional_requirements;
860 }
861
862 sel_vpart_info->format_description( nmsg, c_light_gray, getmaxx( w_msg ) - 4 );
863
864 msg = colorize( nmsg, c_light_gray );
865 return ok || g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
866}
867
868/**
869 * Moves list of fuels up or down.
870 * @param delta -1 if moving up,
871 * 1 if moving down
872 */
873void veh_interact::move_fuel_cursor( int delta )
874{
875 int max_fuel_indicators = static_cast<int>( veh->get_printable_fuel_types().size() );
876 int height = 5;
877 fuel_index += delta;
878
879 if( fuel_index < 0 ) {
880 fuel_index = 0;
881 } else if( fuel_index > max_fuel_indicators - height ) {
882 fuel_index = std::max( max_fuel_indicators - height, 0 );
883 }
884}
885
886static void sort_uilist_entries_by_line_drawing( std::vector<uilist_entry> &shape_ui_entries )
887{
888 // An ordering of the line drawing symbols that does not result in
889 // connecting when placed adjacent to each other vertically.
890 const static std::map<int, int> symbol_order = {
891 { LINE_XOXO, 0 }, { LINE_OXOX, 1 },
892 { LINE_XOOX, 2 }, { LINE_XXOO, 3 },
893 { LINE_XXXX, 4 }, { LINE_OXXO, 5 },
894 { LINE_OOXX, 6 }
895 };
896
897 std::sort( shape_ui_entries.begin(), shape_ui_entries.end(),
898 []( const uilist_entry & a, const uilist_entry & b ) {
899 auto a_iter = symbol_order.find( a.extratxt.sym );
900 auto b_iter = symbol_order.find( b.extratxt.sym );
901 if( a_iter != symbol_order.end() ) {
902 if( b_iter != symbol_order.end() ) {
903 return a_iter->second < b_iter->second;
904 } else {
905 return true;
906 }
907 } else if( b_iter != symbol_order.end() ) {
908 return false;
909 } else {
910 return a.extratxt.sym < b.extratxt.sym;
911 }
912 } );
913}
914
915void veh_interact::do_install()
916{
917 task_reason reason = cant_do( 'i' );
918
919 if( reason == INVALID_TARGET ) {
920 msg = _( "Cannot install any part here." );
921 return;
922 }
923
924 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
925 title = _( "Choose new part to install here:" );
926
927 restore_on_out_of_scope<std::unique_ptr<install_info_t>> prev_install_info( std::move(
928 install_info ) );
929 install_info = std::make_unique<install_info_t>();
930
931 std::array<std::string, 8> &tab_list = install_info->tab_list = { {
932 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "All" ),
933 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Cargo" ),
934 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Light" ),
935 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Util" ),
936 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Hull" ),
937 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Internal" ),
938 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Other" ),
939 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "Filter" )
940 }
941 };
942
943 install_info->tab_list_short = { {
944 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "A" ),
945 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "C" ),
946 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "L" ),
947 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "U" ),
948 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "H" ),
949 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "I" ),
950 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "O" ),
951 pgettext( "Vehicle Parts|", "F" )
952 }
953 };
954
955 std::array <std::function<bool( const vpart_info * )>, 8>
956 tab_filters; // filter for each tab, last one
957 tab_filters[0] = [&]( const vpart_info * ) {
958 return true;
959 }; // All
960 tab_filters[1] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
961 auto &part = *p;
962 return part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CARGO ) && // Cargo
963 !part.has_flag( "TURRET" );
964 };
965 tab_filters[2] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
966 auto &part = *p;
967 return part.has_flag( VPFLAG_LIGHT ) || // Light
968 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
969 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
970 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CIRCLE_LIGHT ) ||
971 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_DOME_LIGHT ) ||
972 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_AISLE_LIGHT ) ||
973 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ATOMIC_LIGHT );
974 };
975 tab_filters[3] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
976 auto &part = *p;
977 return part.has_flag( "TRACK" ) || //Util
978 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_FRIDGE ) ||
979 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_FREEZER ) ||
980 part.has_flag( "KITCHEN" ) ||
981 part.has_flag( "WELDRIG" ) ||
982 part.has_flag( "CRAFTRIG" ) ||
983 part.has_flag( "CHEMLAB" ) ||
984 part.has_flag( "FORGE" ) ||
985 part.has_flag( "HORN" ) ||
986 part.has_flag( "BEEPER" ) ||
987 part.has_flag( "AUTOPILOT" ) ||
988 part.has_flag( "WATCH" ) ||
989 part.has_flag( "ALARMCLOCK" ) ||
990 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_RECHARGE ) ||
991 part.has_flag( "VISION" ) ||
992 part.has_flag( "POWER_TRANSFER" ) ||
993 part.has_flag( "FAUCET" ) ||
994 part.has_flag( "STEREO" ) ||
995 part.has_flag( "CHIMES" ) ||
996 part.has_flag( "MUFFLER" ) ||
997 part.has_flag( "REMOTE_CONTROLS" ) ||
998 part.has_flag( "CURTAIN" ) ||
999 part.has_flag( "SEATBELT" ) ||
1000 part.has_flag( "SECURITY" ) ||
1001 part.has_flag( "SEAT" ) ||
1002 part.has_flag( "BED" ) ||
1003 part.has_flag( "SPACE_HEATER" ) ||
1004 part.has_flag( "COOLER" ) ||
1005 part.has_flag( "DOOR_MOTOR" ) ||
1006 part.has_flag( "WATER_PURIFIER" ) ||
1007 part.has_flag( "WORKBENCH" );
1008 };
1009 tab_filters[4] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
1010 auto &part = *p;
1011 return( part.has_flag( VPFLAG_OBSTACLE ) || // Hull
1012 part.has_flag( "ROOF" ) ||
1013 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ARMOR ) ) &&
1014 !part.has_flag( "WHEEL" ) &&
1015 !tab_filters[3]( p );
1016 };
1017 tab_filters[5] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
1018 auto &part = *p;
1019 return part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ENGINE ) || // Internals
1020 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_ALTERNATOR ) ||
1021 part.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONTROLS ) ||
1022 part.location == "fuel_source" ||
1023 part.location == "on_battery_mount" ||
1024 ( part.location.empty() && part.has_flag( "FUEL_TANK" ) );
1025 };
1026
1027 // Other: everything that's not in the other filters
1028 tab_filters[tab_filters.size() - 2] = [&]( const vpart_info * part ) {
1029 for( size_t i = 1; i < tab_filters.size() - 2; i++ ) {
1030 if( tab_filters[i]( part ) ) {
1031 return false;
1032 }
1033 }
1034 return true;
1035 };
1036
1037 std::string filter; // The user specified filter
1038 tab_filters[7] = [&]( const vpart_info * p ) {
1039 return lcmatch( p->name(), filter );
1040 };
1041
1042 // full list of mountable parts, to be filtered according to tab
1043 std::vector<const vpart_info *> &tab_vparts = install_info->tab_vparts = can_mount;
1044
1045 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1046
1047 int &pos = install_info->pos = 0;
1048 size_t &tab = install_info->tab = 0;
1049
1050 while( true ) {
1051 sel_vpart_info = tab_vparts.empty() ? nullptr : tab_vparts[pos]; // filtered list can be empty
1052
1053 bool can_install = update_part_requirements();
1054
1055 ui_manager::redraw();
1056
1057 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
1058 msg.reset();
1059 if( action == "FILTER" ) {
1060 string_input_popup()
1061 .title( _( "Search for part" ) )
1062 .width( 50 )
1063 .description( _( "Filter" ) )
1064 .max_length( 100 )
1065 .edit( filter );
1066 tab = 7; // Move to the user filter tab.
1067 }
1068 if( action == "REPAIR" ) {
1069 filter.clear();
1070 tab = 0;
1071 }
1072 if( action == "INSTALL" || action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1073 if( can_install ) {
1074 switch( reason ) {
1075 case LOW_MORALE:
1076 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to construct…" );
1077 return;
1078 case LOW_LIGHT:
1079 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing…" );
1080 return;
1081 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1082 msg = _( "You can't install parts while driving." );
1083 return;
1084 default:
1085 break;
1086 }
1087 if( veh->is_foldable() && !sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "FOLDABLE" ) &&
1088 !query_yn( _( "Installing this part will make the vehicle unfoldable. Continue?" ) ) ) {
1089 return;
1090 }
1091 const auto &shapes =
1092 vpart_shapes[ sel_vpart_info->name() + sel_vpart_info->item.str() ];
1093 int selected_shape = -1;
1094 if( shapes.size() > 1 ) { // more than one shape available, display selection
1095 std::vector<uilist_entry> shape_ui_entries;
1096 for( size_t i = 0; i < shapes.size(); i++ ) {
1097 uilist_entry entry( i, true, 0, shapes[i]->name() );
1098 entry.extratxt.left = 1;
1099 entry.extratxt.sym = special_symbol( shapes[i]->sym );
1100 entry.extratxt.color = shapes[i]->color;
1101 shape_ui_entries.push_back( entry );
1102 }
1103 sort_uilist_entries_by_line_drawing( shape_ui_entries );
1104 uilist smenu;
1105 smenu.settext( _( "Choose shape:" ) );
1106 smenu.entries = shape_ui_entries;
1107 smenu.w_width_setup = [this]() {
1108 return getmaxx( w_list );
1109 };
1110 smenu.w_x_setup = [this]( const int ) {
1111 return getbegx( w_list );
1112 };
1113 smenu.w_y_setup = [this]( const int ) {
1114 return getbegy( w_list );
1115 };
1116 smenu.query();
1117 selected_shape = smenu.ret;
1118 } else { // only one shape available, default to first one
1119 selected_shape = 0;
1120 }
1121 if( selected_shape >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( selected_shape ) < shapes.size() ) {
1122 sel_vpart_info = shapes[selected_shape];
1123 sel_cmd = 'i';
1124 return;
1125 }
1126 }
1127 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1128 sel_vpart_info = nullptr;
1129 break;
1130 } else if( action == "PREV_TAB" || action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "FILTER" ||
1131 action == "REPAIR" ) {
1132 tab_vparts.clear();
1133 pos = 0;
1134
1135 if( action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
1136 tab = ( tab < 1 ) ? tab_list.size() - 1 : tab - 1;
1137 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" ) {
1138 tab = ( tab < tab_list.size() - 1 ) ? tab + 1 : 0;
1139 }
1140
1141 copy_if( can_mount.begin(), can_mount.end(), back_inserter( tab_vparts ), tab_filters[tab] );
1142 } else {
1143 move_in_list( pos, action, tab_vparts.size(), 2 );
1144 }
1145 }
1146}
1147
1148bool veh_interact::move_in_list( int &pos, const std::string &action, const int size,
1149 const int header ) const
1150{
1151 int lines_per_page = page_size - header;
1152 if( action == "PREV_TAB" || action == "LEFT" ) {
1153 pos -= lines_per_page;
1154 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "RIGHT" ) {
1155 pos += lines_per_page;
1156 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1157 pos--;
1158 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1159 pos++;
1160 } else {
1161 // Anything else -> no movement
1162 return false;
1163 }
1164 if( pos < 0 ) {
1165 pos = size - 1;
1166 } else if( pos >= size ) {
1167 pos = 0;
1168 }
1169 return true;
1170}
1171
1172void veh_interact::do_repair()
1173{
1174 task_reason reason = cant_do( 'r' );
1175
1176 if( reason == INVALID_TARGET ) {
1177 vehicle_part *most_repairable = get_most_repariable_part();
1178 if( most_repairable && most_repairable->damage_percent() ) {
1179 move_cursor( ( most_repairable->mount + dd ).rotate( 3 ) );
1180 return;
1181 }
1182 }
1183
1184 auto can_repair = [this, &reason]() {
1185 switch( reason ) {
1186 case LOW_MORALE:
1187 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to repair…" );
1188 return false;
1189 case LOW_LIGHT:
1190 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing…" );
1191 return false;
1192 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1193 msg = _( "You can't repair stuff while driving." );
1194 return false;
1195 case INVALID_TARGET:
1196 msg = _( "There are no damaged parts on this vehicle." );
1197 return false;
1198 default:
1199 break;
1200 }
1201 return true;
1202 };
1203
1204 if( !can_repair() ) {
1205 return;
1206 }
1207
1208 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1209 title = _( "Choose a part here to repair:" );
1210
1211 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1212
1213 int pos = 0;
1214
1215 restore_on_out_of_scope<int> prev_hilight_part( highlight_part );
1216
1217 while( true ) {
1218 vehicle_part &pt = veh->part( parts_here[need_repair[pos]] );
1219 const vpart_info &vp = pt.info();
1220
1221 std::string nmsg;
1222
1223 bool ok;
1224 if( pt.is_broken() ) {
1225 ok = format_reqs( nmsg, vp.install_requirements(), vp.install_skills, vp.install_time( g->u ) );
1226 } else {
1227 if( !vp.repair_requirements().is_empty() && pt.base.max_damage() > 0 ) {
1228 ok = format_reqs( nmsg, vp.repair_requirements() * pt.base.damage_level( 4 ), vp.repair_skills,
1229 vp.repair_time( g->u ) * pt.base.damage() / pt.base.max_damage() );
1230 } else {
1231 nmsg += colorize( _( "This part cannot be repaired" ), c_light_red );
1232 ok = false;
1233 }
1234 }
1235
1236 const nc_color desc_color = pt.is_broken() ? c_dark_gray : c_light_gray;
1237 vp.format_description( nmsg, desc_color, getmaxx( w_msg ) - 4 );
1238
1239 msg = colorize( nmsg, c_light_gray );
1240
1241 highlight_part = need_repair[pos];
1242
1243 ui_manager::redraw();
1244
1245 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
1246 msg.reset();
1247 if( ( action == "REPAIR" || action == "CONFIRM" ) && ok ) {
1248 reason = cant_do( 'r' );
1249 if( !can_repair() ) {
1250 return;
1251 }
1252 sel_vehicle_part = &pt;
1253 sel_vpart_info = &vp;
1254 const std::vector<npc *> helpers = g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 );
1255 for( const npc *np : helpers ) {
1256 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task…" ), np->name );
1257 }
1258 sel_cmd = 'r';
1259 break;
1260
1261 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1262 break;
1263
1264 } else {
1265 move_in_list( pos, action, need_repair.size() );
1266 }
1267 }
1268}
1269
1270void veh_interact::do_mend()
1271{
1272 switch( cant_do( 'm' ) ) {
1273 case LOW_MORALE:
1274 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to mend…" );
1275 return;
1276 case LOW_LIGHT:
1277 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing…" );
1278 return;
1279 case INVALID_TARGET:
1280 msg = _( "No faulty parts require mending." );
1281 return;
1282 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1283 msg = _( "You can't mend stuff while driving." );
1284 return;
1285 default:
1286 break;
1287 }
1288
1289 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1290 title = _( "Choose a part here to mend:" );
1291
1292 const bool toggling = g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
1293 auto sel = [toggling]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1294 if( toggling ) {
1295 return !pt.faults_potential().empty();
1296 } else {
1297 return !pt.faults().empty();
1298 }
1299 };
1300
1301 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1302 g->u.mend_item( veh->part_base( veh->index_of_part( &pt ) ) );
1303 sel_cmd = 'q';
1304 };
1305
1306 overview( sel, act );
1307}
1308
1309void veh_interact::do_refill()
1310{
1311 switch( cant_do( 'f' ) ) {
1312 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1313 msg = _( "You can't refill a moving vehicle." );
1314 return;
1315
1316 case INVALID_TARGET:
1317 msg = _( "No parts can currently be refilled." );
1318 return;
1319
1320 default:
1321 break;
1322 }
1323
1324 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1325 title = _( "Select part to refill:" );
1326
1327 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1328 auto validate = [&]( const item & obj ) {
1329 if( pt.is_tank() ) {
1330 if( obj.is_container() && !obj.contents.empty() ) {
1331 return pt.can_reload( obj.contents.front() );
1332 }
1333 } else if( pt.is_fuel_store() ) {
1334 bool can_reload = pt.can_reload( obj );
1335 if( obj.typeId() == fuel_type_battery && can_reload ) {
1336 msg = _( "You cannot recharge a vehicle battery with handheld batteries" );
1337 return false;
1338 }
1339 return can_reload;
1340 }
1341 return false;
1342 };
1343
1344 target = g->inv_map_splice( validate, string_format( _( "Refill %s" ), pt.name() ), 1 );
1345 if( target ) {
1346 sel_vehicle_part = &pt;
1347 sel_vpart_info = &pt.info();
1348 sel_cmd = 'f';
1349 }
1350 };
1351
1352 overview( can_refill, act );
1353}
1354
1355void veh_interact::calc_overview()
1356{
1357 const auto next_hotkey = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt, char &hotkey ) {
1358 if( overview_action && overview_enable && overview_enable( pt ) ) {
1359 const char ret = hotkey;
1360 // Calculate next hotkey
1361 ++hotkey;
1362 bool finish = false;
1363 while( !finish ) {
1364 switch( hotkey ) {
1365 default:
1366 finish = true;
1367 break;
1368 case '{':
1369 hotkey = 'A';
1370 break;
1371 case 'c':
1372 case 'g':
1373 case 'j':
1374 case 'k':
1375 case 'l':
1376 case 'p':
1377 case 'q':
1378 case 't':
1379 case 'v':
1380 case 'x':
1381 case 'z':
1382 ++hotkey;
1383 break;
1384 }
1385 }
1386 return ret;
1387 } else {
1388 return '\0';
1389 }
1390 };
1391
1392 overview_opts.clear();
1393 overview_headers.clear();
1394
1395 int epower_w = veh->net_battery_charge_rate_w();
1396 overview_headers["ENGINE"] = [this]( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1397 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray,
1398 string_format( _( "Engines: %sSafe %4d kW</color> %sMax %4d kW</color>" ),
1399 health_color( true ), veh->total_power_w( true, true ) / 1000,
1400 health_color( false ), veh->total_power_w() / 1000 ) );
1401 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Fuel Use" ) );
1402 };
1403 overview_headers["TANK"] = []( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1404 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, _( "Tanks" ) );
1405 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Contents Qty" ) );
1406 };
1407 overview_headers["BATTERY"] = [epower_w]( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1408 std::string batt;
1409 if( std::abs( epower_w ) < 10000 ) {
1410 batt = string_format( _( "Batteries: %s%+4d W</color>" ),
1411 health_color( epower_w >= 0 ), epower_w );
1412 } else {
1413 batt = string_format( _( "Batteries: %s%+4.1f kW</color>" ),
1414 health_color( epower_w >= 0 ), epower_w / 1000.0 );
1415 }
1416 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, batt );
1417 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Capacity Status" ) );
1418 };
1419 overview_headers["REACTOR"] = [this, epower_w]( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1420 int reactor_epower_w = veh->max_reactor_epower_w();
1421 if( reactor_epower_w > 0 && epower_w < 0 ) {
1422 reactor_epower_w += epower_w;
1423 }
1424 std::string reactor;
1425 if( reactor_epower_w == 0 ) {
1426 reactor = _( "Reactors" );
1427 } else if( reactor_epower_w < 10000 ) {
1428 reactor = string_format( _( "Reactors: Up to %s%+4d W</color>" ),
1429 health_color( reactor_epower_w ), reactor_epower_w );
1430 } else {
1431 reactor = string_format( _( "Reactors: Up to %s%+4.1f kW</color>" ),
1432 health_color( reactor_epower_w ), reactor_epower_w / 1000.0 );
1433 }
1434 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, reactor );
1435 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Contents Qty" ) );
1436 };
1437 overview_headers["TURRET"] = []( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1438 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, _( "Turrets" ) );
1439 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Ammo Qty" ) );
1440 };
1441 overview_headers["SEAT"] = []( const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1442 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_light_gray, _( "Seats" ) );
1443 right_print( w, y, 1, c_light_gray, _( "Who" ) );
1444 };
1445
1446 char hotkey = 'a';
1447
1448 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1449 if( vpr.part().is_engine() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1450 // if tank contains something then display the contents in milliliters
1451 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1452 right_print(
1453 w, y, 1, pt.ammo_current()->color,
1454 string_format(
1455 "%s <color_light_gray>%s</color>",
1456 !pt.fuel_current().is_null() ? item::nname( pt.fuel_current() ) : "",
1457 //~ translation should not exceed 3 console cells
1458 right_justify( pt.enabled ? _( "Yes" ) : _( "No" ), 3 ) ) );
1459 };
1460
1461 // display engine faults (if any)
1462 auto msg_cb = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1463 msg = std::string();
1464 for( const auto &e : pt.faults() ) {
1465 msg = msg.value() + string_format( "%s\n %s\n\n", colorize( e->name(), c_red ),
1466 colorize( e->description(), c_light_gray ) );
1467 }
1468 };
1469 overview_opts.emplace_back( "ENGINE", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details,
1470 msg_cb );
1471 }
1472 }
1473
1474 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1475 if( vpr.part().is_tank() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1476 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1477 if( !pt.ammo_current().is_null() ) {
1478 std::string specials;
1479 const item &it = pt.base.contents.front();
1480 // a space isn't actually needed in front of the tags here,
1481 // but item::display_name tags use a space so this prevents
1482 // needing *second* translation for the same thing with a
1483 // space in front of it
1484 if( it.rotten() ) {
1485 specials += _( " (rotten)" );
1486 }
1487 const itype *pt_ammo_cur = &*pt.ammo_current();
1488 auto stack = units::legacy_volume_factor / pt_ammo_cur->stack_size;
1489 int offset = 1;
1490 std::string fmtstring = "%s %s %5.1fL";
1491 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1492 fmtstring = "%s %s " + leak_marker + "%5.1fL" + leak_marker;
1493 offset = 0;
1494 }
1495 right_print( w, y, offset, pt_ammo_cur->color,
1496 string_format( fmtstring, specials, pt_ammo_cur->nname( 1 ),
1497 round_up( to_liter( pt.ammo_remaining() * stack ), 1 ) ) );
1498 } else {
1499 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1500 std::string outputstr = leak_marker + " " + leak_marker;
1501 right_print( w, y, 0, c_light_gray, outputstr );
1502 }
1503 }
1504 };
1505 overview_opts.emplace_back( "TANK", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1506 } else if( vpr.part().is_fuel_store() && !( vpr.part().is_battery() || vpr.part().is_reactor() ) &&
1507 !vpr.part().is_broken() ) {
1508 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1509 if( !pt.ammo_current().is_null() ) {
1510 const itype *pt_ammo_cur = &*pt.ammo_current();
1511 auto stack = units::legacy_volume_factor / pt_ammo_cur->stack_size;
1512 int offset = 1;
1513 std::string fmtstring = "%s %5.1fL";
1514 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1515 fmtstring = "%s " + leak_marker + "%5.1fL" + leak_marker;
1516 offset = 0;
1517 }
1518 right_print( w, y, offset, pt_ammo_cur->color,
1519 string_format( fmtstring, item::nname( pt.ammo_current() ),
1520 round_up( to_liter( pt.ammo_remaining() * stack ), 1 ) ) );
1521 }
1522 };
1523 overview_opts.emplace_back( "TANK", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1524 }
1525 }
1526
1527 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1528 if( vpr.part().is_battery() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1529 // always display total battery capacity and percentage charge
1530 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1531 int pct = ( static_cast<double>( pt.ammo_remaining() ) / pt.ammo_capacity() ) * 100;
1532 int offset = 1;
1533 std::string fmtstring = "%i %3i%%";
1534 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1535 fmtstring = "%i " + leak_marker + "%3i%%" + leak_marker;
1536 offset = 0;
1537 }
1538 right_print( w, y, offset, pt.ammo_current()->color,
1539 string_format( fmtstring, pt.ammo_capacity(), pct ) );
1540 };
1541 overview_opts.emplace_back( "BATTERY", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1542 }
1543 }
1544
1545 auto details_ammo = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1546 if( pt.ammo_remaining() ) {
1547 int offset = 1;
1548 std::string fmtstring = "%s %5i";
1549 if( pt.is_leaking() ) {
1550 fmtstring = "%s " + leak_marker + "%5i" + leak_marker;
1551 offset = 0;
1552 }
1553 right_print( w, y, offset, pt.ammo_current()->color,
1554 string_format( fmtstring, item::nname( pt.ammo_current() ), pt.ammo_remaining() ) );
1555 }
1556 };
1557
1558 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1559 if( vpr.part().is_reactor() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1560 overview_opts.emplace_back( "REACTOR", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ),
1561 details_ammo );
1562 }
1563 }
1564
1565 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1566 if( vpr.part().is_turret() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1567 overview_opts.emplace_back( "TURRET", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ),
1568 details_ammo );
1569 }
1570 }
1571
1572 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
1573 auto details = []( const vehicle_part & pt, const catacurses::window & w, int y ) {
1574 const npc *who = pt.crew();
1575 if( who ) {
1576 right_print( w, y, 1, pt.passenger_id == who->getID() ? c_green : c_light_gray, who->name );
1577 }
1578 };
1579 if( vpr.part().is_seat() && vpr.part().is_available() ) {
1580 overview_opts.emplace_back( "SEAT", &vpr.part(), next_hotkey( vpr.part(), hotkey ), details );
1581 }
1582 }
1583}
1584
1585void veh_interact::display_overview()
1586{
1587 werase( w_list );
1588 std::string last;
1589 int y = 0;
1590 if( overview_offset ) {
1591 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 1,
1592 c_yellow, _( "'{' to scroll up" ) );
1593 y++;
1594 }
1595 for( int idx = overview_offset; idx != static_cast<int>( overview_opts.size() ); ++idx ) {
1596 const auto &pt = *overview_opts[idx].part;
1597
1598 // if this is a new section print a header row
1599 if( last != overview_opts[idx].key ) {
1600 y += last.empty() ? 0 : 1;
1601 overview_headers[overview_opts[idx].key]( w_list, y );
1602 y += 2;
1603 last = overview_opts[idx].key;
1604 }
1605
1606 bool highlighted = false;
1607 // No action means no selecting, just highlight relevant ones
1608 if( overview_pos < 0 && overview_enable && !overview_action ) {
1609 highlighted = overview_enable( pt );
1610 } else if( overview_pos == idx ) {
1611 highlighted = true;
1612 }
1613
1614 // print part name
1615 nc_color col = overview_opts[idx].hotkey ? c_white : c_dark_gray;
1616 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 1,
1617 highlighted ? hilite( col ) : col,
1618 "<color_dark_gray>%c </color>%s",
1619 overview_opts[idx].hotkey ? overview_opts[idx].hotkey : ' ', pt.name() );
1620
1621 // print extra columns (if any)
1622 overview_opts[idx].details( pt, w_list, y );
1623 y++;
1624 if( y < ( getmaxy( w_list ) - 1 ) ) {
1625 overview_limit = overview_offset;
1626 } else {
1627 overview_limit = idx;
1628 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 1, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 1,
1629 c_yellow, _( "'}' to scroll down" ) );
1630 break;
1631 }
1632 }
1633
1634 wnoutrefresh( w_list );
1635}
1636
1637void veh_interact::overview( const overview_enable_t &enable,
1638 const overview_action_t &action )
1639{
1640 restore_on_out_of_scope<overview_enable_t> prev_overview_enable( overview_enable );
1641 restore_on_out_of_scope<overview_action_t> prev_overview_action( overview_action );
1642 overview_enable = enable;
1643 overview_action = action;
1644
1645 restore_on_out_of_scope<int> prev_overview_pos( overview_pos );
1646
1647 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1648
1649 while( true ) {
1650 calc_overview();
1651
1652 if( overview_pos < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( overview_pos ) >= overview_opts.size() ) {
1653 overview_pos = -1;
1654 do {
1655 if( ++overview_pos >= static_cast<int>( overview_opts.size() ) ) {
1656 overview_pos = -1;
1657 break; // nothing could be selected
1658 }
1659 } while( !overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey );
1660 }
1661
1662 const bool has_any_hotkey = std::any_of( overview_opts.begin(), overview_opts.end(),
1663 []( const part_option & e ) {
1664 return e.hotkey;
1665 } );
1666 if( !has_any_hotkey ) {
1667 return; // nothing is selectable
1668 }
1669
1670 if( overview_pos >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( overview_pos ) < overview_opts.size() ) {
1671 move_cursor( ( overview_opts[overview_pos].part->mount + dd ).rotate( 3 ) );
1672 }
1673
1674 if( overview_pos >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( overview_pos ) < overview_opts.size() &&
1675 overview_opts[overview_pos].message ) {
1676 overview_opts[overview_pos].message( *overview_opts[overview_pos].part );
1677 } else {
1678 msg.reset();
1679 }
1680
1681 ui_manager::redraw();
1682
1683 const std::string input = main_context.handle_input();
1684 msg.reset();
1685 if( input == "CONFIRM" && overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey && overview_action ) {
1686 overview_action( *overview_opts[overview_pos].part );
1687 break;
1688
1689 } else if( input == "QUIT" ) {
1690 break;
1691
1692 } else if( input == "UP" ) {
1693 do {
1694 move_overview_line( -1 );
1695 if( --overview_pos < 0 ) {
1696 overview_pos = overview_opts.size() - 1;
1697 }
1698 } while( !overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey );
1699 } else if( input == "DOWN" ) {
1700 do {
1701 move_overview_line( 1 );
1702 if( ++overview_pos >= static_cast<int>( overview_opts.size() ) ) {
1703 overview_pos = 0;
1704 }
1705 } while( !overview_opts[overview_pos].hotkey );
1706 } else {
1707 // did we try and activate a hotkey option?
1708 char hotkey = main_context.get_raw_input().get_first_input();
1709 if( hotkey && overview_action ) {
1710 auto iter = std::find_if( overview_opts.begin(),
1711 overview_opts.end(), [&hotkey]( const part_option & e ) {
1712 return e.hotkey == hotkey;
1713 } );
1714 if( iter != overview_opts.end() ) {
1715 overview_action( *iter->part );
1716 break;
1717 }
1718 }
1719 }
1720 }
1721}
1722
1723void veh_interact::move_overview_line( int amount )
1724{
1725 overview_offset += amount;
1726 overview_offset = std::max( 0, overview_offset );
1727 overview_offset = std::min( overview_limit, overview_offset );
1728}
1729
1730vehicle_part *veh_interact::get_most_damaged_part() const
1731{
1732 auto part_damage_comparison = []( const vpart_reference & a, const vpart_reference & b ) {
1733 return !b.part().removed && b.part().base.damage() > a.part().base.damage();
1734 };
1735 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh->get_all_parts();
1736 auto high_damage_iterator = std::max_element( vpr.begin(),
1737 vpr.end(),
1738 part_damage_comparison );
1739 if( high_damage_iterator == vpr.end() ||
1740 high_damage_iterator->part().removed ) {
1741 return nullptr;
1742 }
1743
1744 return &( *high_damage_iterator ).part();
1745}
1746
1747vehicle_part *veh_interact::get_most_repariable_part() const
1748{
1749 auto &part = veh_utils::most_repairable_part( *veh, g->u );
1750 return part ? &part : nullptr;
1751}
1752
1753bool veh_interact::can_remove_part( int idx, const player &p )
1754{
1755 sel_vehicle_part = &veh->part( idx );
1756 sel_vpart_info = &sel_vehicle_part->info();
1757 std::string nmsg;
1758
1759 if( sel_vehicle_part->is_broken() ) {
1760 nmsg += string_format(
1761 _( "<color_white>Removing the broken %1$s may yield some fragments.</color>\n" ),
1762 sel_vehicle_part->name() );
1763 } else {
1764 item result_of_removal = sel_vehicle_part->properties_to_item();
1765 nmsg += string_format(
1766 _( "<color_white>Removing the %1$s will yield:</color>\n> %2$s\n" ),
1767 sel_vehicle_part->name(), result_of_removal.display_name() );
1768 }
1769
1770 const auto reqs = sel_vpart_info->removal_requirements();
1771 bool ok = format_reqs( nmsg, reqs, sel_vpart_info->removal_skills,
1772 sel_vpart_info->removal_time( p ) );
1773 std::string additional_requirements;
1774 bool lifting_or_jacking_required = false;
1775
1776 int lvl = 0;
1777 int str = 0;
1778 quality_id qual;
1779 bool use_aid = false;
1780 bool use_str = false;
1781 item base( sel_vpart_info->item );
1782 if( sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NEEDS_JACKING" ) ) {
1783 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
1784 qual = qual_JACK;
1785 lvl = jack_quality( *veh );
1786 str = veh->lift_strength();
1787 use_aid = ( max_jack >= lvl ) || can_self_jack();
1788 use_str = g->u.can_lift( str );
1789 } else if( get_option<bool>( "DISABLE_LIFTING" ) || sel_vpart_info->has_flag( "NO_LIFT_REQ" ) ) {
1790 use_aid = true;
1791 use_str = true;
1792 } else {
1793 lifting_or_jacking_required = true;
1794 qual = qual_LIFT;
1795 lvl = std::ceil( units::quantity<double, units::mass::unit_type>( base.weight() ) /
1796 TOOL_LIFT_FACTOR );
1797 str = base.lift_strength();
1798 use_aid = max_lift >= lvl;
1799 use_str = g->u.can_lift( base.lift_strength() );
1800 }
1801
1802 if( !( use_aid || use_str ) ) {
1803 ok = false;
1804 }
1805 if( lifting_or_jacking_required ) {
1806 nc_color aid_color = use_aid ? c_green : ( use_str ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
1807 nc_color str_color = use_str ? c_green : ( use_aid ? c_dark_gray : c_red );
1808 const auto helpers = g->u.get_crafting_helpers();
1809 //~ %1$s is quality name, %2$d is quality level
1810 std::string aid_string = string_format( _( "1 tool with %1$s %2$d" ),
1811 qual.obj().name, lvl );
1812
1813 std::string str_string;
1814 if( !helpers.empty() ) {
1815 str_string = string_format( _( "strength ( assisted ) %d" ), str );
1816 } else {
1817 str_string = string_format( _( "strength %d" ), str );
1818 }
1819
1820 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s <color_white>OR</color> %2$s" ),
1821 colorize( aid_string, aid_color ), colorize( str_string, str_color ) ) + "\n";
1822 }
1823 std::string reason;
1824 if( !veh->can_unmount( idx, reason ) ) {
1825 //~ %1$s represents the internal color name which shouldn't be translated, %2$s is pre-translated reason
1826 additional_requirements += string_format( _( "> %1$s%2$s</color>" ), status_color( false ),
1827 reason ) + "\n";
1828 ok = false;
1829
1830 }
1831 if( !additional_requirements.empty() ) {
1832 nmsg += _( "<color_white>Additional requirements:</color>\n" );
1833 nmsg += additional_requirements;
1834 }
1835 const nc_color desc_color = sel_vehicle_part->is_broken() ? c_dark_gray : c_light_gray;
1836 sel_vehicle_part->info().format_description( nmsg, desc_color, getmaxx( w_msg ) - 4 );
1837
1838 msg = colorize( nmsg, c_light_gray );
1839 return ok || g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS );
1840}
1841
1842void veh_interact::do_remove()
1843{
1844 task_reason reason = cant_do( 'o' );
1845
1846 if( reason == INVALID_TARGET ) {
1847 msg = _( "No parts here." );
1848 return;
1849 }
1850
1851 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1852 title = _( "Choose a part here to remove:" );
1853
1854 int pos = 0;
1855 for( size_t i = 0; i < parts_here.size(); i++ ) {
1856 if( can_remove_part( parts_here[ i ], g->u ) ) {
1857 pos = i;
1858 break;
1859 }
1860 }
1861 msg.reset();
1862
1863 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> current_ui = create_or_get_ui_adaptor();
1864
1865 restore_on_out_of_scope<overview_enable_t> prev_overview_enable( overview_enable );
1866
1867 restore_on_out_of_scope<int> prev_hilight_part( highlight_part );
1868
1869 while( true ) {
1870 int part = parts_here[ pos ];
1871
1872 bool can_remove = can_remove_part( part, g->u );
1873
1874 overview_enable = [this, part]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1875 return &pt == &veh->part( part );
1876 };
1877
1878 highlight_part = pos;
1879
1880 calc_overview();
1881 ui_manager::redraw();
1882
1883 //read input
1884 const std::string action = main_context.handle_input();
1885 msg.reset();
1886 if( can_remove && ( action == "REMOVE" || action == "CONFIRM" ) ) {
1887 switch( reason ) {
1888 case LOW_MORALE:
1889 msg = _( "Your morale is too low to construct…" );
1890 return;
1891 case LOW_LIGHT:
1892 msg = _( "It's too dark to see what you are doing…" );
1893 return;
1894 case NOT_FREE:
1895 msg = _( "You cannot remove that part while something is attached to it." );
1896 return;
1897 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1898 msg = _( "Better not remove something while driving." );
1899 return;
1900 default:
1901 break;
1902 }
1903 const std::vector<npc *> helpers = g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 );
1904 for( const npc *np : helpers ) {
1905 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task…" ), np->name );
1906 }
1907 sel_cmd = 'o';
1908 break;
1909 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1910 break;
1911 } else {
1912 move_in_list( pos, action, parts_here.size() );
1913 }
1914 }
1915}
1916
1917void veh_interact::do_siphon()
1918{
1919 switch( cant_do( 's' ) ) {
1920 case INVALID_TARGET:
1921 msg = _( "The vehicle has no liquid fuel left to siphon." );
1922 return;
1923
1924 case LACK_TOOLS:
1925 msg = _( "You need a <color_red>hose</color> to siphon liquid fuel." );
1926 return;
1927
1928 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1929 msg = _( "You can't siphon from a moving vehicle." );
1930 return;
1931
1932 default:
1933 break;
1934 }
1935
1936 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
1937 title = _( "Select part to siphon:" );
1938
1939 auto sel = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1940 return( pt.is_tank() && pt.base.contents_made_of( LIQUID ) );
1941 };
1942
1943 auto act = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1944 on_out_of_scope restore_ui( [&]() {
1945 hide_ui( false );
1946 } );
1947 hide_ui( true );
1948 const item &base = pt.get_base();
1949 const int idx = veh->find_part( base );
1950 item liquid( base.contents.back() );
1951 const int liq_charges = liquid.charges;
1952 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( liquid, nullptr, 1, nullptr, veh, idx ) ) {
1953 veh->drain( idx, liq_charges - liquid.charges );
1954 }
1955 };
1956
1957 overview( sel, act );
1958}
1959
1960bool veh_interact::do_unload()
1961{
1962 switch( cant_do( 'd' ) ) {
1963 case INVALID_TARGET:
1964 msg = _( "The vehicle has no solid fuel left to remove." );
1965 return false;
1966
1967 case MOVING_VEHICLE:
1968 msg = _( "You can't unload from a moving vehicle." );
1969 return false;
1970
1971 default:
1972 break;
1973 }
1974
1975 act_vehicle_unload_fuel( veh );
1976 return true;
1977}

1979void veh_interact::do_change_shape()
1980{
1981 if( cant_do( 'p' ) == task_reason::INVALID_TARGET ) {
1982 msg = _( "No parts here or the part visible from your position does not have different shapes" );
1983 return;
1984 }
1985
1986 vehicle_part &part = veh->part( veh->part_displayed_at( veh->part( cpart ).mount ) );
1987 const vpart_info &part_info = part.info();
1988
1989 using v_shapes = std::vector<const vpart_info *, std::allocator<const vpart_info *>>;
1990 const v_shapes &shapes = vpart_shapes[part_info.name() + part_info.item.str()];
1991
1992 uilist smenu;
1993 smenu.text = _( "Choose shape:" );
1994 smenu.w_width_setup = [this]() {
1995 return getmaxx( w_list );
1996 };
1997 smenu.w_x_setup = [this]( const int ) {
1998 return getbegx( w_list );
1999 };
2000 smenu.w_y_setup = [this]( const int ) {
2001 return getbegy( w_list );
2002 };
2003
2004 int ret_code = 0;
2005 for( const vpart_info *const shape : shapes ) {
2006 uilist_entry entry( shape->name() );
2007 entry.retval = ret_code++;
2008 entry.extratxt.left = 1;
2009 entry.extratxt.sym = special_symbol( shape->sym );
2010 entry.extratxt.color = shape->color;
2011 smenu.entries.emplace_back( entry );
2012 }
2013
2014 sort_uilist_entries_by_line_drawing( smenu.entries );
2015
2016 smenu.query();
2017 if( smenu.ret >= 0 ) {
2018 const vpart_info *selected_shape = shapes[smenu.ret];
2019 part.proxy_part_id = selected_shape->get_id();
2020 part.proxy_sym = selected_shape->sym;
2021 }
2022}

2024void veh_interact::do_assign_crew()
2025{
2026 if( cant_do( 'w' ) != CAN_DO ) {
2027 msg = _( "Need at least one seat and an ally to assign crew members." );
2028 return;
2029 }
2030
2031 restore_on_out_of_scope<cata::optional<std::string>> prev_title( title );
2032 title = _( "Assign crew positions:" );
2033
2034 auto sel = []( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
2035 return pt.is_seat();
2036 };
2037
2038 auto act = [&]( vehicle_part & pt ) {
2039 uilist menu;
2040 menu.text = _( "Select crew member" );
2041
2042 if( pt.crew() ) {
2043 menu.addentry( 0, true, 'c', _( "Clear assignment" ) );
2044 }
2045
2046 for( const npc *e : g->allies() ) {
2047 menu.addentry( e->getID().get_value(), true, -1, e->name );
2048 }
2049
2050 menu.query();
2051 if( menu.ret == 0 ) {
2052 pt.unset_crew();
2053 } else if( menu.ret > 0 ) {
2054 const auto &who = *g->critter_by_id<npc>( character_id( menu.ret ) );
2055 veh->assign_seat( pt, who );
2056 }
2057 };
2058
2059 overview( sel, act );
2060}

2095/**
2096 * Returns the first part on the vehicle at the given position.
2097 * @param d The coordinates, relative to the viewport's 0-point (?)
2098 * @return The first vehicle part at the specified coordinates.
2099 */
2100int veh_interact::part_at( const point &d )
2101{
2102 const point vd = -dd + d.rotate( 1 );
2103 return veh->part_displayed_at( vd );
2104}
2105
2106/**
2107 * Checks to see if you can potentially install this part at current position.
2108 * Affects coloring in display_list() and is also used to
2109 * sort can_mount so potentially installable parts come first.
2110 */
2111bool veh_interact::can_potentially_install( const vpart_info &vpart )
2112{
2113 return g->u.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ||
2114 vpart.install_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( crafting_inv, is_crafting_component );
2115}
2116
2117/**
2118 * Moves the cursor on the vehicle editing window.
2119 * @param d How far to move the cursor.
2120 * @param dstart_at How far to change the start position for vehicle part descriptions
2121 */
2122void veh_interact::move_cursor( const point &d, int dstart_at )
2123{
2124 dd += d.rotate( 3 );
2125 if( d != point_zero ) {
2126 start_limit = 0;
2127 } else {
2128 start_at += dstart_at;
2129 }
2130
2131 // Update the current active component index to the new position.
2132 cpart = part_at( point_zero );
2133 const point vd = -dd;
2134 const point q = veh->coord_translate( vd );
2135 const tripoint vehp = veh->global_pos3() + q;
2136 const bool has_critter = g->critter_at( vehp );
2137 bool obstruct = g->m.impassable_ter_furn( vehp );
2138 const optional_vpart_position ovp = g->m.veh_at( vehp );
2139 if( ovp && &ovp->vehicle() != veh ) {
2140 obstruct = true;
2141 }
2142
2143 can_mount.clear();
2144 if( !obstruct ) {
2145 int divider_index = 0;
2146 for( const auto &e : vpart_info::all() ) {
2147 const vpart_info &vp = e.second;
2148 if( has_critter && vp.has_flag( VPFLAG_OBSTACLE ) ) {
2149 continue;
2150 }
2151 if( veh->can_mount( vd, vp.get_id() ) ) {
2152 if( vp.get_id() != vpart_shapes[ vp.name() + vp.item.str() ][ 0 ]->get_id() ) {
2153 // only add first shape to install list
2154 continue;
2155 }
2156 if( can_potentially_install( vp ) ) {
2157 can_mount.insert( can_mount.begin() + divider_index++, &vp );
2158 } else {
2159 can_mount.push_back( &vp );
2160 }
2161 }
2162 }
2163 }
2164
2165 need_repair.clear();
2166 parts_here.clear();
2167 wheel = nullptr;
2168 if( cpart >= 0 ) {
2169 parts_here = veh->parts_at_relative( veh->part( cpart ).mount, true );
2170 for( size_t i = 0; i < parts_here.size(); i++ ) {
2171 auto &pt = veh->part( parts_here[i] );
2172
2173 if( pt.base.damage() > 0 && pt.info().is_repairable() ) {
2174 need_repair.push_back( i );
2175 }
2176 if( pt.info().has_flag( "WHEEL" ) ) {
2177 wheel = &pt;
2178 }
2179 }
2180 }
2181
2182 /* Update the lifting quality to be the that is available for this newly selected tile */
2183 cache_tool_availability_update_lifting( vehp );
2184}

2186void veh_interact::display_grid()
2187{
2188 // border window
2189 draw_border( w_border );
2190
2191 // match grid lines
2192 const int y_mode = getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1;
2193 // |-
2194 mvwputch( w_border, point( 0, y_mode ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXXO );
2195 // -|
2196 mvwputch( w_border, point( TERMX - 1, y_mode ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXX );
2197 const int y_list = getbegy( w_list ) + getmaxy( w_list );
2198 // |-
2199 mvwputch( w_border, point( 0, y_list ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXXO );
2200 // -|
2201 mvwputch( w_border, point( TERMX - 1, y_list ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXX );
2202
2203 const int grid_w = getmaxx( w_border ) - 2;
2204
2205 // Two lines dividing the three middle sections.

2207 // |
2208 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 1, i + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXO );
2209 // |
2210 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 2 + getmaxx( w_list ), i + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR,
2211 LINE_XOXO );
2212 }
2213 // Two lines dividing the vertical menu sections.
2214 for( int i = 0; i < grid_w; ++i ) {
2215 // -
2216 mvwputch( w_border, point( i + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXOX );
2217 // -
2218 mvwputch( w_border, point( i + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 2 + page_size ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXOX );
2219 }
2220 // Fix up the line intersections.
2221 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 1, getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1 ), BORDER_COLOR,
2222 LINE_OXXX );
2223 // _|_

2225 LINE_XXOX );
2226 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 2 + getmaxx( w_list ), getmaxy( w_mode ) + 1 ),
2227 BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXXX );
2228 // _|_
2229 mvwputch( w_border, point( getmaxx( w_disp ) + 2 + getmaxx( w_list ),
2230 getmaxy( w_mode ) + 2 + page_size ),
2231 BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXOX );
2232
2233 wnoutrefresh( w_border );
