2236/**
2237 * Draws the viewport with the vehicle.
2238 */
2239void veh_interact::display_veh()
2240{
2241 werase( w_disp );
2242 const point h_size = point( getmaxx( w_disp ), getmaxy( w_disp ) ) / 2;
2243
2244 if( debug_mode ) {
2245 // show CoM, pivot in debug mode
2246
2247 const point &pivot = veh->pivot_point();
2248 const point &com = veh->local_center_of_mass();
2249 const point cur = -dd;
2250
2251 mvwprintz( w_disp, point_zero, c_green, "CoM %d,%d", com.x, com.y );
2252 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
2253 mvwprintz( w_disp, point( 0, 1 ), c_red, "Pivot %d,%d", pivot.x, pivot.y );
2254 mvwprintz( w_disp, point( 0, 2 ), c_dark_gray, "Cur %d,%d", cur.x, cur.y );
2255
2256 const point com_s = ( com + dd ).rotate( 3 ) + h_size;
2257 const point pivot_s = ( pivot + dd ).rotate( 3 ) + h_size;
2258
2259 for( int x = 0; x < getmaxx( w_disp ); ++x ) {
2260 if( x <= com_s.x ) {
2261 mvwputch( w_disp, point( x, com_s.y ), c_green, LINE_OXOX );
2262 }
2263
2264 if( x >= pivot_s.x ) {
2265 mvwputch( w_disp, point( x, pivot_s.y ), c_red, LINE_OXOX );
2266 }
2267 }
2268
2269 for( int y = 0; y < getmaxy( w_disp ); ++y ) {
2270 if( y <= com_s.y ) {
2271 mvwputch( w_disp, point( com_s.x, y ), c_green, LINE_XOXO );
2272 }
2273
2274 if( y >= pivot_s.y ) {
2275 mvwputch( w_disp, point( pivot_s.x, y ), c_red, LINE_XOXO );
2276 }
2277 }
2278 }
2279
2280 // Draw guidelines to make current selection point more visible.
2281 for( int y = 0; y < getmaxy( w_disp ); ++y ) {
2282 mvwputch( w_disp, point( h_size.x, y ), c_dark_gray, LINE_XOXO );
2283 }
2284
2285 for( int x = 0; x < getmaxx( w_disp ); ++x ) {
2286 mvwputch( w_disp, point( x, h_size.y ), c_dark_gray, LINE_OXOX );
2287 }
2288
2289 //Iterate over structural parts so we only hit each square once
2290 std::vector<int> structural_parts = veh->all_parts_at_location( "structure" );
2291 for( auto &structural_part : structural_parts ) {
2292 const int p = structural_part;
2293 int sym = veh->part_sym( p );
2294 nc_color col = veh->part_color( p );
2295
2296 const point q = ( veh->part( p ).mount + dd ).rotate( 3 );
2297
2298 if( q == point_zero ) {
2299 col = hilite( col );
2300 cpart = p;
2301 }
2302 mvwputch( w_disp, h_size + q, col, special_symbol( sym ) );
2303 }
2304
2305 const int hw = getmaxx( w_disp ) / 2;
2306 const int hh = getmaxy( w_disp ) / 2;
2307 const point vd = -dd;
2308 const point q = veh->coord_translate( vd );
2309 const tripoint vehp = veh->global_pos3() + q;
2310 bool obstruct = g->m.impassable_ter_furn( vehp );
2311 const optional_vpart_position ovp = g->m.veh_at( vehp );
2312 if( ovp && &ovp->vehicle() != veh ) {
2313 obstruct = true;
2314 }
2315 nc_color col = cpart >= 0 ? veh->part_color( cpart ) : c_black;
2316 int sym = cpart >= 0 ? veh->part_sym( cpart ) : ' ';
2317 mvwputch( w_disp, point( hw, hh ), obstruct ? red_background( col ) : hilite( col ),
2318 special_symbol( sym ) );
2319 wnoutrefresh( w_disp );
2320}
2321
2322static std::string wheel_state_description( const vehicle &veh )
2323{
2324 bool is_boat = !veh.floating.empty();
2325 bool is_land = !veh.wheelcache.empty() || !is_boat;
2326
2327 bool suf_land = veh.sufficient_wheel_config();
2328 bool bal_land = veh.balanced_wheel_config();
2329
2330 bool suf_boat = veh.can_float();
2331
2332 float steer = veh.steering_effectiveness();
2333
2334 std::string wheel_status;
2335 if( !suf_land && is_boat ) {
2336 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>disabled</color>" );
2337 } else if( !suf_land ) {
2338 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>lack</color>" );
2339 } else if( !bal_land ) {
2340 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>unbalanced</color>" );
2341 } else if( steer < 0 ) {
2342 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>no steering</color>" );
2343 } else if( steer < 0.033 ) {
2344 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>broken steering</color>" );
2345 } else if( steer < 0.5 ) {
2346 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_red>poor steering</color>" );
2347 } else {
2348 wheel_status = _( "<color_light_green>enough</color>" );
2349 }
2350
2351 std::string boat_status;
2352 if( !suf_boat ) {
2353 boat_status = _( "<color_light_red>sinks</color>" );
2354 } else {
2355 boat_status = _( "<color_light_blue>floats</color>" );
2356 }
2357
2358 if( is_boat && is_land ) {
2359 return string_format( _( "Wheels/boat: %s/%s" ), wheel_status, boat_status );
2360 }
2361
2362 if( is_boat ) {
2363 return string_format( _( "Boat: %s" ), boat_status );
2364 }
2365
2366 return string_format( _( "Wheels: %s" ), wheel_status );
2367}
2368
2369/**
2370 * Displays the vehicle's stats at the bottom of the window.
2371 */
2372void veh_interact::display_stats() const
2373{
2374 werase( w_stats );
2375
2376 // see exec()
2377 const int extraw = ( ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4 ) * 2;
2378 // 3 * stats_h
2379 const int slots = 24;
2380 int x[slots], y[slots], w[slots];
2381
2382 units::volume total_cargo = 0_ml;
2383 units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
2384 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_any_parts( "CARGO" ) ) {
2385 const size_t p = vp.part_index();
2386 total_cargo += veh->max_volume( p );
2387 free_cargo += veh->free_volume( p );
2388 }
2389
2390 const int second_column = 33 + ( extraw / 4 );
2391 const int third_column = 65 + ( extraw / 2 );
2392 for( int i = 0; i < slots; i++ ) {
2393 if( i < stats_h ) {
2394 // First column
2395 x[i] = 1;
2396 y[i] = i;
2397 w[i] = second_column - 2;
2398 } else if( i < ( 2 * stats_h ) ) {
2399 // Second column
2400 x[i] = second_column;
2401 y[i] = i - stats_h;
2402 w[i] = third_column - second_column - 1;
2403 } else {
2404 // Third column
2405 x[i] = third_column;
2406 y[i] = i - 2 * stats_h;
2407 w[i] = extraw - third_column - 2;
2408 }
2409 }
2410
2411 bool is_boat = !veh->floating.empty();
2412 bool is_ground = !veh->wheelcache.empty() || !is_boat;
2413 bool is_aircraft = veh->is_rotorcraft() && veh->is_flying_in_air();
2414
2415 const auto vel_to_int = []( const double vel ) {
2416 return static_cast<int>( convert_velocity( vel, VU_VEHICLE ) );
2417 };
2418
2419 int i = 0;
2420
2421 // these lambdas simplifies printing stat for vehicle line-by-line
2422 const auto print_stat_color = [&]( auto color, auto ...args ) {
2423 fold_and_print( w_stats, point( x[i], y[i] ), w[i], color, args... );
2424 i++;
2425 };
2426 const auto print_stat = [&]( auto ...args ) {
2427 print_stat_color( c_light_gray, args... );
2428 };
2429 // print empty line if condition not matches
2430 const auto print_stat_if = [&]( bool condition, auto ...args ) {
2431 if( condition ) {
2432 print_stat( args... );
2433 } else {
2434 i++;
2435 }
2436 };
2437
2438 if( is_aircraft ) {
2439 print_stat(
2440 _( "Air Safe/Top Speed: <color_light_green>%3d</color>/<color_light_red>%3d</color> %s" ),
2441 vel_to_int( veh->safe_rotor_velocity( false ) ),
2442 vel_to_int( veh->max_rotor_velocity( false ) ),
2443 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2444 print_stat(
2445 _( "Air Acceleration: <color_light_blue>%3d</color> %s/s" ),
2446 vel_to_int( veh->rotor_acceleration( false ) ),
2447 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2448 } else {
2449 if( is_ground ) {
2450 print_stat(
2451 _( "Safe/Top Speed: <color_light_green>%3d</color>/<color_light_red>%3d</color> %s" ),
2452 vel_to_int( veh->safe_ground_velocity( false ) ),
2453 vel_to_int( veh->max_ground_velocity( false ) ),
2454 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2455 // TODO: extract accelerations units to its own function
2456 print_stat(
2457 //~ /t means per turn
2458 _( "Acceleration: <color_light_blue>%3d</color> %s/s" ),
2459 vel_to_int( veh->ground_acceleration( false ) ),
2460 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2461 } else {
2462 i += 2;
2463 }
2464 if( is_boat ) {
2465 print_stat(
2466 _( "Water Safe/Top Speed: <color_light_green>%3d</color>/<color_light_red>%3d</color> %s" ),
2467 vel_to_int( veh->safe_water_velocity( false ) ),
2468 vel_to_int( veh->max_water_velocity( false ) ),
2469 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2470 // TODO: extract accelerations units to its own function
2471 print_stat(
2472 //~ /t means per turn
2473 _( "Water Acceleration: <color_light_blue>%3d</color> %s/s" ),
2474 vel_to_int( veh->water_acceleration( false ) ),
2475 velocity_units( VU_VEHICLE ) );
2476 } else {
2477 i += 2;
2478 }
2479 }
2480 print_stat(
2481 _( "Mass: <color_light_blue>%5.0f</color> %s" ),
2482 convert_weight( veh->total_mass() ), weight_units() );
2483 if( veh->has_part( "ROTOR" ) ) {
2484 // convert newton to kg.
2485 units::mass lift_as_mass = units::from_newton(
2486 veh->lift_thrust_of_rotorcraft( true ) );
2487 print_stat(
2488 _( "Maximum Lift: <color_light_blue>%5.0f</color> %s" ),
2489 convert_weight( lift_as_mass ),
2490 weight_units() );
2491 }
2492 print_stat(
2493 _( "Cargo Volume: <color_light_blue>%s</color> / <color_light_blue>%s</color> %s" ),
2494 format_volume( total_cargo - free_cargo ),
2495 format_volume( total_cargo ), volume_units_abbr() );
2496 // Write the overall damage
2497 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( x[i], y[i] ), c_light_gray, _( "Status:" ) );
2498 x[i] += utf8_width( _( "Status:" ) ) + 1;
2499 print_stat_color( total_durability_color, total_durability_text );
2500
2501 print_stat( wheel_state_description( *veh ) );
2502
2503 //This lambda handles printing parts in the "Most damaged" and "Needs repair" cases
2504 //for the veh_interact ui
2505 const auto print_part = [&]( const std::string & str, int slot, vehicle_part * pt ) {
2506 mvwprintz( w_stats, point( x[slot], y[slot] ), c_light_gray, str );
2507 int iw = utf8_width( str ) + 1;
2508 return fold_and_print( w_stats, point( x[slot] + iw, y[slot] ), w[slot], c_light_gray, pt->name() );
2509 };
2510
2511 vehicle_part *mostDamagedPart = get_most_damaged_part();
2512 vehicle_part *most_repairable = get_most_repariable_part();
2513
2514 // Write the most damaged part
2515 if( mostDamagedPart && mostDamagedPart->damage_percent() ) {
2516 const std::string damaged_header = mostDamagedPart == most_repairable ?
2517 _( "Most damaged:" ) :
2518 _( "Most damaged (can't repair):" );
2519 i += print_part( damaged_header, i, mostDamagedPart );
2520 } else {
2521 i += 1;
2522 }
2523
2524 // Write the part that needs repair the most.
2525 if( most_repairable && most_repairable != mostDamagedPart ) {
2526 const std::string needsRepair = _( "Needs repair:" );
2527 i += print_part( needsRepair, i, most_repairable );
2528 } else {
2529 i += 1;
2530 }
2531
2532 print_stat(
2533 _( "Air drag: <color_light_blue>%5.2f</color>" ),
2534 veh->coeff_air_drag() );
2535
2536 print_stat_if( is_boat,
2537 _( "Water drag: <color_light_blue>%5.2f</color>" ),
2538 veh->coeff_water_drag() );
2539
2540 print_stat_if( is_ground,
2541 _( "Rolling drag: <color_light_blue>%5.2f</color>" ),
2542 veh->coeff_rolling_drag() );
2543
2544 print_stat(
2545 _( "Static drag: <color_light_blue>%5d</color>" ),
2546 veh->static_drag( false ) );
2547
2548 print_stat(
2549 _( "Offroad: <color_light_blue>%4d</color>%%" ),
2550 static_cast<int>( veh->k_traction( veh->wheel_area() *
2551 veh->average_or_rating() ) * 100 ) );
2552
2553 if( is_boat ) {
2554
2555 const double water_clearance = veh->water_hull_height() - veh->water_draft();
2556 std::string draft_string = water_clearance > 0 ?
2557 _( "Draft/Clearance:<color_light_blue>%4.2f</color>m/<color_light_blue>%4.2f</color>m" ) :
2558 _( "Draft/Clearance:<color_light_blue>%4.2f</color>m/<color_light_red>%4.2f</color>m" );
2559
2560 print_stat(
2561 draft_string.c_str(),
2562 veh->water_draft(), water_clearance );
2563 }
2564
2565 i = std::max( i, 2 * stats_h );
2566
2567 // Print fuel percentage & type name only if it fits in the window, 10 is width of "E...F 100%"
2568 veh->print_fuel_indicators( w_stats, point( x[i], y[i] ), fuel_index, true,
2569 ( x[ i ] + 10 < getmaxx( w_stats ) ),
2570 ( x[ i ] + 10 < getmaxx( w_stats ) ) );
2571
2572 if( install_info ) {
2573 const int details_w = getmaxx( w_details );
2574 // clear rightmost blocks of w_stats to avoid overlap
2575 int stats_col_2 = 33;
2576 int stats_col_3 = 65 + ( ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4 );
2577 int clear_x = getmaxx( w_stats ) - details_w + 1 >= stats_col_3 ? stats_col_3 : stats_col_2;
2578 for( int i = 0; i < getmaxy( w_stats ); i++ ) {
2579 mvwhline( w_stats, point( clear_x, i ), ' ', getmaxx( w_stats ) - clear_x );
2580 }
2581 }
2582
2583 wnoutrefresh( w_stats );
2584}

2598/**
2599 * Prints the list of usable commands, and highlights the hotkeys used to activate them.
2600 */
2601void veh_interact::display_mode()
2602{
2603 werase( w_mode );
2604
2605 if( title.has_value() ) {
2606 nc_color title_col = c_light_gray;
2607 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
2608 print_colored_text( w_mode, point( 1, 0 ), title_col, title_col, title.value() );
2609 } else {
2610 size_t esc_pos = display_esc( w_mode );
2611
2612 // broken indentation preserved to avoid breaking git history for large number of lines
2613 const std::array<std::string, 11> actions = { {
2614 { _( "<i>nstall" ) },
2615 { _( "<r>epair" ) },
2616 { _( "<m>end" ) },
2617 { _( "re<f>ill" ) },
2618 { _( "rem<o>ve" ) },
2619 { _( "<s>iphon" ) },
2620 { _( "unloa<d>" ) },
2621 { _( "cre<w>" ) },
2622 { _( "sha<p>e" ) },
2623 { _( "r<e>name" ) },
2624 { _( "l<a>bel" ) },
2625 }
2626 };
2627
2628 const std::array<bool, std::tuple_size<decltype( actions )>::value> enabled = { {
2629 !cant_do( 'i' ),
2630 !cant_do( 'r' ),
2631 !cant_do( 'm' ),
2632 !cant_do( 'f' ),
2633 !cant_do( 'o' ),
2634 !cant_do( 's' ),
2635 !cant_do( 'd' ),
2636 !cant_do( 'w' ),
2637 !cant_do( 'p' ),
2638 true, // 'rename' is always available
2639 !cant_do( 'a' ),
2640 }
2641 };
2642
2643 int pos[std::tuple_size<decltype( actions )>::value + 1];
2644 pos[0] = 1;
2645 for( size_t i = 0; i < actions.size(); i++ ) {
2646 pos[i + 1] = pos[i] + utf8_width( actions[i] ) - 2;
2647 }
2648 int spacing = static_cast<int>( ( esc_pos - 1 - pos[actions.size()] ) / actions.size() );
2649 int shift = static_cast<int>( ( esc_pos - pos[actions.size()] - spacing *
2650 ( actions.size() - 1 ) ) / 2 ) - 1;
2651 for( size_t i = 0; i < actions.size(); i++ ) {
2652 shortcut_print( w_mode, point( pos[i] + spacing * i + shift, 0 ),
2653 enabled[i] ? c_light_gray : c_dark_gray, enabled[i] ? c_light_green : c_green,
2654 actions[i] );
2655 }
2656 }
2657 wnoutrefresh( w_mode );
2658}
2659
2660size_t veh_interact::display_esc( const catacurses::window &win )
2661{
2662 std::string backstr = _( "<ESC>-back" );
2663 // right text align
2664 size_t pos = getmaxx( win ) - utf8_width( backstr ) + 2;
2665 shortcut_print( win, point( pos, 0 ), c_light_gray, c_light_green, backstr );
2666 return pos;
2667}

2669/**
2670 * Draws the list of parts that can be mounted in the selected square. Used
2671 * when installing new parts.
2672 * @param pos The current cursor position in the list.
2673 * @param list The list to display parts from.
2674 * @param header Number of lines occupied by the list header
2675 */
2676void veh_interact::display_list( size_t pos, const std::vector<const vpart_info *> &list,
2677 const int header )
2678{
2679 werase( w_list );
2680 int lines_per_page = page_size - header;
2681 size_t page = pos / lines_per_page;
2682 for( size_t i = page * lines_per_page; i < ( page + 1 ) * lines_per_page && i < list.size(); i++ ) {
2683 const vpart_info &info = *list[i];
2684 int y = i - page * lines_per_page + header;
2685 mvwputch( w_list, point( 1, y ), info.color, special_symbol( info.sym ) );
2686 nc_color col = can_potentially_install( info ) ? c_white : c_dark_gray;
2687 trim_and_print( w_list, point( 3, y ), getmaxx( w_list ) - 3, pos == i ? hilite( col ) : col,
2688 info.name() );
2689 }
2690
2691 if( install_info ) {
2692 auto &tab_list = install_info->tab_list;
2693 auto &tab_list_short = install_info->tab_list_short;
2694 auto &tab = install_info->tab;
2695 // draw tab menu
2696 int tab_x = 0;
2697 for( size_t i = 0; i < tab_list.size(); i++ ) {
2698 std::string tab_name = ( tab == i ) ? tab_list[i] : tab_list_short[i]; // full name for selected tab
2699 tab_x += ( tab == i ); // add a space before selected tab
2700 draw_subtab( w_list, tab_x, tab_name, tab == i, false );
2701 tab_x += ( 1 + utf8_width( tab_name ) + ( tab ==
2702 i ) ); // one space padding and add a space after selected tab
2703 }
2704 }
2705 wnoutrefresh( w_list );
2706}
2707
2708/**
2709 * Used when installing parts.
2710 * Opens up w_details containing info for part currently selected in w_list.
2711 */
2712void veh_interact::display_details( const vpart_info *part )
2713{
2714 const int details_w = getmaxx( w_details );
2715
2716 werase( w_details );
2717
2718 wborder( w_details, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO,
2719 LINE_XOOX );
2720
2721 if( part == nullptr ) {
2722 wnoutrefresh( w_details );
2723 return;
2724 }
2725 // displays data in two columns
2726 int column_width = details_w / 2;
2727 int col_1 = 2;
2728 int col_2 = col_1 + column_width;
2729 int line = 0;
2730 bool small_mode = column_width < 20;
2731
2732 // line 0: part name
2733 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line ), details_w, c_light_green, part->name() );
2734
2735 // line 1: (column 1) durability (column 2) damage mod
2736 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 1 ), column_width, c_white,
2737 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d</color>",
2738 small_mode ? _( "Dur" ) : _( "Durability" ),
2739 part->durability );
2740 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 1 ), column_width, c_white,
2741 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d%%</color>",
2742 small_mode ? _( "Dmg" ) : _( "Damage" ),
2743 part->dmg_mod );
2744
2745 // line 2: (column 1) weight (column 2) folded volume (if applicable)
2746 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 2 ), column_width, c_white,
2747 "%s: <color_light_gray>%.1f%s</color>",
2748 small_mode ? _( "Wgt" ) : _( "Weight" ),
2749 convert_weight( part->item->weight ),
2750 weight_units() );
2751 if( part->folded_volume != 0_ml ) {
2752 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 2 ), column_width, c_white,
2753 "%s: <color_light_gray>%s %s</color>",
2754 small_mode ? _( "FoldVol" ) : _( "Folded Volume" ),
2755 format_volume( part->folded_volume ),
2756 volume_units_abbr() );
2757 }
2758
2759 // line 3: (column 1) size, bonus, wheel diameter (if applicable) (column 2) epower, wheel width (if applicable)
2760 if( part->size > 0_ml && part->has_flag( VPFLAG_CARGO ) ) {
2761 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2762 "%s: <color_light_gray>%s %s</color>",
2763 small_mode ? _( "Cap" ) : _( "Capacity" ),
2764 format_volume( part->size ), volume_units_abbr() );
2765 }
2766
2767 if( part->bonus > 0 ) {
2768 std::string label;
2769 if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_SEATBELT ) ) {
2770 label = small_mode ? _( "Str" ) : _( "Strength" );
2771 } else if( part->has_flag( "HORN" ) ) {
2772 label = _( "Noise" );
2773 } else if( part->has_flag( "MUFFLER" ) ) {
2774 label = small_mode ? _( "NoisRed" ) : _( "Noise Reduction" );
2775 } else if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_EXTENDS_VISION ) ) {
2776 label = _( "Range" );
2777 } else if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_LIGHT ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
2778 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
2779 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_CIRCLE_LIGHT ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_DOME_LIGHT ) ||
2780 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_AISLE_LIGHT ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_EVENTURN ) ||
2781 part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ODDTURN ) || part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ATOMIC_LIGHT ) ) {
2782 label = _( "Light" );
2783 }
2784
2785 if( !label.empty() ) {
2786 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2787 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d</color>", label,
2788 part->bonus );
2789 }
2790 }
2791
2792 if( part->has_flag( VPFLAG_WHEEL ) ) {
2793 // Note: there is no guarantee that whl is non-empty!
2794 const cata::value_ptr<islot_wheel> &whl = part->item->wheel;
2795 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2796 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d\"</color>",
2797 small_mode ? _( "Dia" ) : _( "Wheel Diameter" ),
2798 whl ? whl->diameter : 0 );
2799 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2800 "%s: <color_light_gray>%d\"</color>",
2801 small_mode ? _( "Wdt" ) : _( "Wheel Width" ),
2802 whl ? whl->width : 0 );
2803 }
2804
2805 if( part->epower != 0 ) {
2806 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 3 ), column_width, c_white,
2807 "%s: <color_light_gray>%+4d</color>",
2808 small_mode ? _( "Epwr" ) : _( "Electric Power" ),
2809 part->epower );
2810 }
2811
2812 // line 4 [horizontal]: fuel_type (if applicable)
2813 // line 4 [vertical/hybrid]: (column 1) fuel_type (if applicable) (column 2) power (if applicable)
2814 // line 5 [horizontal]: power (if applicable)
2815 if( !part->fuel_type.is_null() ) {
2816 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 4 ), column_width,
2817 c_white, _( "Charge: <color_light_gray>%s</color>" ),
2818 item::nname( part->fuel_type ) );
2819 }
2820 int part_consumption = part->energy_consumption;
2821 if( part_consumption != 0 ) {
2822 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 4 ), column_width, c_white,
2823 _( "Drain: <color_light_gray>%+8d</color>" ), -part_consumption );
2824 }
2825
2826 // line 5 [vertical/hybrid] flags
2827 std::vector<std::string> flags = { { "OPAQUE", "OPENABLE", "BOARDABLE" } };
2828 std::vector<std::string> flag_labels = { { _( "opaque" ), _( "openable" ), _( "boardable" ) } };
2829 std::string label;
2830 for( size_t i = 0; i < flags.size(); i++ ) {
2831 if( part->has_flag( flags[i] ) ) {
2832 label += ( label.empty() ? "" : " " ) + flag_labels[i];
2833 }
2834 }
2835 // 6 [horizontal]: (column 1) flags (column 2) battery capacity (if applicable)
2836 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_1, line + 5 ), details_w, c_yellow, label );
2837
2838 if( part->fuel_type == itype_battery && !part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ENGINE ) &&
2839 !part->has_flag( VPFLAG_ALTERNATOR ) ) {
2840 const cata::value_ptr<islot_magazine> &battery = part->item->magazine;
2841 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 5 ), column_width, c_white,
2842 "%s: <color_light_gray>%8d</color>",
2843 small_mode ? _( "BatCap" ) : _( "Battery Capacity" ),
2844 battery->capacity );
2845 } else {
2846 int part_power = part->power;
2847 if( part_power == 0 ) {
2848 part_power = item( part->item ).engine_displacement();
2849 }
2850 if( part_power != 0 ) {
2851 fold_and_print( w_details, point( col_2, line + 5 ), column_width, c_white,
2852 _( "Power: <color_light_gray>%+8d</color>" ), part_power );
2853 }
2854 }
2855
2856 wnoutrefresh( w_details );
2857}
2858
2859void veh_interact::count_durability()
2860{
2861 const vehicle_part_range vpr = veh->get_all_parts();
2862 int qty = std::accumulate( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), 0,
2863 []( int lhs, const vpart_reference & rhs ) {
2864 return lhs + std::max( rhs.part().base.damage(), 0 );
2865 } );
2866
2867 int total = std::accumulate( vpr.begin(), vpr.end(), 0,
2868 []( int lhs, const vpart_reference & rhs ) {
2869 return lhs + rhs.part().base.max_damage();
2870 } );
2871
2872 int pct = total ? 100 * qty / total : 0;
2873
2874 if( pct < 5 ) {
2875 total_durability_text = _( "like new" );
2876 total_durability_color = c_light_green;
2877
2878 } else if( pct < 33 ) {
2879 total_durability_text = _( "dented" );
2880 total_durability_color = c_yellow;
2881
2882 } else if( pct < 66 ) {
2883 total_durability_text = _( "battered" );
2884 total_durability_color = c_magenta;
2885
2886 } else if( pct < 100 ) {
2887 total_durability_text = _( "wrecked" );
2888 total_durability_color = c_red;
2889
2890 } else {
2891 total_durability_text = _( "destroyed" );
2892 total_durability_color = c_dark_gray;
2893 }
2894}
2895
2896void act_vehicle_siphon( vehicle *veh )
2897{
2898 std::vector<itype_id> fuels;
2899 bool has_liquid = false;
2900 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_any_parts( VPFLAG_FLUIDTANK ) ) {
2901 if( vp.part().get_base().contents_made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
2902 has_liquid = true;
2903 break;
2904 }
2905 }
2906 if( !has_liquid ) {
2907 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vehicle has no liquid fuel left to siphon." ) );
2908 return;
2909 }
2910
2911 std::string title = _( "Select tank to siphon:" );
2912 auto sel = []( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
2913 return pt.is_tank() && pt.get_base().contents_made_of( LIQUID );
2914 };
2915 vehicle_part &tank = veh_interact::select_part( *veh, sel, title );
2916 if( tank ) {
2917 const item &base = tank.get_base();
2918 const int idx = veh->find_part( base );
2919 item liquid( base.contents.back() );
2920 const int liq_charges = liquid.charges;
2921 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( liquid, nullptr, 1, nullptr, veh, idx ) ) {
2922 veh->drain( idx, liq_charges - liquid.charges );
2923 veh->invalidate_mass();
2924 }
2925 }
2926}
2927
2928void act_vehicle_unload_fuel( vehicle *veh )
2929{
2930 std::vector<itype_id> fuels;
2931 for( auto &e : veh->fuels_left() ) {
2932 if( e.first == fuel_type_battery || e.first->phase != SOLID ) {
2933 // This skips battery and plutonium cells
2934 continue;
2935 }
2936 fuels.push_back( e.first );
2937 }
2938 if( fuels.empty() ) {
2939 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vehicle has no solid fuel left to remove." ) );
2940 return;
2941 }
2942 itype_id fuel;
2943 if( fuels.size() > 1 ) {
2944 uilist smenu;
2945 smenu.text = _( "Remove what?" );
2946 for( size_t i = 0; i < fuels.size(); i++ ) {
2947 const itype_id &fuel = fuels[i];
2948 if( fuel == itype_plut_cell && veh->fuel_left( fuel ) < PLUTONIUM_CHARGES ) {
2949 continue;
2950 }
2951 smenu.entries.emplace_back( uilist_entry( item::nname( fuel ) )
2952 .with_retval( static_cast<int>( i ) ) );
2953 }
2954 smenu.query();
2955 if( smenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( smenu.ret ) >= fuels.size() ) {
2956 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2957 return;
2958 }
2959 fuel = fuels[smenu.ret];
2960 } else {
2961 fuel = fuels.front();
2962 }
2963
2964 int qty = veh->fuel_left( fuel );
2965 if( fuel == itype_plut_cell ) {
2966 if( qty / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES == 0 ) {
2967 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vehicle has no fully charged plutonium cells." ) );
2968 return;
2969 }
2970 item plutonium( fuel, calendar::turn, qty / PLUTONIUM_CHARGES );
2971 add_msg( m_info, _( "You unload %s from the vehicle." ), plutonium.display_name() );
2972 veh->drain( fuel, qty - ( qty % PLUTONIUM_CHARGES ) );
2973 g->u.i_add_or_drop( plutonium );
2974 } else {
2975 item solid_fuel( fuel, calendar::turn, qty );
2976 add_msg( m_info, _( "You unload %s from the vehicle." ), solid_fuel.display_name() );
2977 veh->drain( fuel, qty );
2978 g->u.i_add_or_drop( solid_fuel );
2979 }
2980}
2981
2982/**
2983 * Called when the activity timer for installing parts, repairing, etc times
2984 * out and the action is complete.
2985 */
2986void veh_interact::complete_vehicle( player &p )
2987{
2988 if( p.activity.values.size() < 7 ) {
2989 debugmsg( "Invalid activity ACT_VEHICLE values:%d", p.activity.values.size() );
2990 return;
2991 }
2992
2993 map &here = get_map();
2994 optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( tripoint( p.activity.values[0],
2995 p.activity.values[1], p.posz() ) ) );
2996 if( !vp ) {
2997 // so the vehicle could have lost some of its parts from other NPCS works during this player/NPCs activity.
2998 // check the vehicle points that were stored at beginning of activity.
2999 if( !p.activity.coord_set.empty() ) {
3000 for( const auto pt : p.activity.coord_set ) {
3001 vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( pt ) );
3002 if( vp ) {
3003 break;
3004 }
3005 }
3006 }
3007 // check again, to see if it really is a case of vehicle gone missing.
3008 if( !vp ) {
3009 debugmsg( "Activity ACT_VEHICLE: vehicle not found" );
3010 return;
3011 }
3012 }
3013 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
3014
3015 point d( p.activity.values[4], p.activity.values[5] );
3016 int vehicle_part = p.activity.values[6];
3017 const vpart_id part_id( p.activity.str_values[0] );
3018
3019 const vpart_info &vpinfo = part_id.obj();
3020
3021 // cmd = Install Repair reFill remOve Siphon Unload reName relAbel
3022 switch( static_cast<char>( p.activity.index ) ) {
3023 case 'i': {
3024 const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
3025
3026 const auto reqs = vpinfo.install_requirements();
3027 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3028 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't meet the requirements to install the %s." ), vpinfo.name() );
3029 break;
3030 }
3031
3032 // consume items extracting a match for the parts base item
3033 item base;
3034 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3035 for( auto &obj : p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3036 if( obj.typeId() == vpinfo.item ) {
3037 base = obj;
3038 }
3039 }
3040 }
3041 if( base.is_null() ) {
3042 if( !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
3043 add_msg( m_info, _( "Could not find base part in requirements for %s." ), vpinfo.name() );
3044 break;
3045 } else {
3046 base = item( vpinfo.item );
3047 }
3048 }
3049
3050 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3051 p.consume_tools( e );
3052 }
3053
3054 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3055
3056 int partnum = !base.is_null() ? veh->install_part( d, part_id,
3057 std::move( base ) ) : -1;
3058 if( partnum < 0 ) {
3059 debugmsg( "complete_vehicle install part fails dx=%d dy=%d id=%s", d.x, d.y, part_id.c_str() );
3060 break;
3061 }
3062
3063 // Need map-relative coordinates to compare to output of look_around.
3064 // Need to call coord_translate() directly since it's a new part.
3065 const point q = veh->coord_translate( d );
3066
3067 if( vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
3068 vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
3069 vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_HALF_CIRCLE_LIGHT ) ) {
3070 // Stash offset and set it to the location of the part so look_around will start there.
3071 const tripoint old_view_offset = p.view_offset;
3072 const tripoint offset = veh->global_pos3() + q;
3073 p.view_offset = offset - p.pos();
3074
3075 point delta;
3076 do {
3077 popup( _( "Press space, choose a facing direction for the new %s and confirm with enter." ),
3078 vpinfo.name() );
3079 const cata::optional<tripoint> chosen = g->look_around();
3080 if( !chosen ) {
3081 continue;
3082 }
3083 delta = ( *chosen - offset ).xy();
3084 // atan2 only gives reasonable values when delta is not all zero
3085 } while( delta == point_zero );
3086
3087 // Restore previous view offsets.
3088 p.view_offset = old_view_offset;
3089
3090 units::angle dir = normalize( atan2( delta ) - veh->face.dir() );
3091
3092 veh->part( partnum ).direction = dir;
3093 }
3094
3095 const tripoint vehp = veh->global_pos3() + tripoint( q, 0 );
3096 // TODO: allow boarding for non-players as well.
3097 player *const pl = g->critter_at<player>( vehp );
3098 if( vpinfo.has_flag( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) && pl ) {
3099 g->m.board_vehicle( vehp, pl );
3100 }
3101
3102 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You install a %1$s into the %2$s." ), veh->part( partnum ).name(),
3103 veh->name );
3104
3105 for( const auto &sk : vpinfo.install_skills ) {
3106 p.practice( sk.first, veh_utils::calc_xp_gain( vpinfo, sk.first, p ) );
3107 }
3108 here.add_vehicle_to_cache( veh );
3109 break;
3110 }
3111
3112 case 'r': {
3113 veh_utils::repair_part( *veh, veh->part( vehicle_part ), p );
3114 break;
3115 }
3116
3117 case 'f': {
3118 if( p.activity.targets.empty() || !p.activity.targets.front() ) {
3119 debugmsg( "Activity ACT_VEHICLE: missing refill source" );
3120 break;
3121 }
3122
3123 item_location &src = p.activity.targets.front();
3124 struct vehicle_part &pt = veh->part( vehicle_part );
3125 if( pt.is_tank() && src->is_container() && !src->contents.empty() ) {
3126
3127 pt.base.fill_with( src->contents.front() );
3128 src->on_contents_changed();
3129
3130 if( pt.ammo_remaining() != pt.ammo_capacity() ) {
3131 //~ 1$s vehicle name, 2$s tank name
3132 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You refill the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, pt.name() );
3133 } else {
3134 //~ 1$s vehicle name, 2$s tank name
3135 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You completely refill the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, pt.name() );
3136 }
3137
3138 if( src->contents.front().charges == 0 ) {
3139 src->remove_item( src->contents.front() );
3140 } else {
3141 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "There's some left over!" ) );
3142 }
3143
3144 } else if( pt.is_fuel_store() ) {
3145 auto qty = src->charges;
3146 pt.base.reload( p, std::move( src ), qty );
3147
3148 //~ 1$s vehicle name, 2$s reactor name
3149 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You refuel the %1$s's %2$s." ), veh->name, pt.name() );
3150
3151 } else {
3152 debugmsg( "vehicle part is not reloadable" );
3153 break;
3154 }
3155
3156 veh->invalidate_mass();
3157 break;
3158 }
3159
3160 case 'o': {
3161 const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
3162 if( vehicle_part >= veh->part_count() ) {
3163 vehicle_part = veh->get_next_shifted_index( vehicle_part, p );
3164 if( vehicle_part == -1 ) {
3165 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s has already been removed by someone else." ),
3166 vpinfo.name() );
3167 return;
3168 }
3169 }
3170 const auto reqs = vpinfo.removal_requirements();
3171 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3172 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't meet the requirements to remove the %s." ), vpinfo.name() );
3173 break;
3174 }
3175 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3176 p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
3177 }
3178 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3179 p.consume_tools( e );
3180 }
3181
3182 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3183
3184 // This will be a list of all the items which arise from this removal.
3185 std::list<item> resulting_items;
3186
3187 // First we get all the contents of the part
3188 vehicle_stack contents = veh->get_items( vehicle_part );
3189 resulting_items.insert( resulting_items.end(), contents.begin(), contents.end() );
3190 contents.clear();
3191
3192 // Power cables must remove parts from the target vehicle, too.
3193 if( veh->part_flag( vehicle_part, "POWER_TRANSFER" ) ) {
3194 veh->remove_remote_part( vehicle_part );
3195 }
3196 if( veh->is_towing() || veh->is_towed() ) {
3197 std::cout << "vehicle is towing/towed" << std::endl;
3198 vehicle *other_veh = veh->is_towing() ? veh->tow_data.get_towed() : veh->tow_data.get_towed_by();
3199 if( other_veh ) {
3200 std::cout << "other veh exists" << std::endl;
3201 other_veh->remove_part( other_veh->part_with_feature( other_veh->get_tow_part(), "TOW_CABLE",
3202 true ) );
3203 other_veh->tow_data.clear_towing();
3204 }
3205 veh->tow_data.clear_towing();
3206 }
3207 bool broken = veh->part( vehicle_part ).is_broken();
3208
3209 if( broken ) {
3210 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the broken %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3211 veh->part( vehicle_part ).name(), veh->name );
3212 } else {
3213 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3214 veh->part( vehicle_part ).name(), veh->name );
3215 }
3216
3217 if( !broken ) {
3218 resulting_items.push_back( veh->part( vehicle_part ).properties_to_item() );
3219 for( const auto &sk : vpinfo.install_skills ) {
3220 // removal is half as educational as installation
3221 p.practice( sk.first, veh_utils::calc_xp_gain( vpinfo, sk.first, p ) / 2 );
3222 }
3223
3224 } else {
3225 auto pieces = veh->part( vehicle_part ).pieces_for_broken_part();
3226 resulting_items.insert( resulting_items.end(), pieces.begin(), pieces.end() );
3227 }
3228
3229 if( veh->part_count() < 2 ) {
3230 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You completely dismantle the %s." ), veh->name );
3231 p.activity.set_to_null();
3232 int veh_z = veh->sm_pos.z;
3233 here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
3234 here.reset_vehicle_cache( veh_z );
3235 } else {
3236 point mount = veh->part( vehicle_part ).mount;
3237 const tripoint &part_pos = veh->global_part_pos3( vehicle_part );
3238 veh->remove_part( vehicle_part );
3239 // part_removal_cleanup calls refresh, so parts_at_relative is valid
3240 veh->part_removal_cleanup();
3241 if( veh->parts_at_relative( mount, true ).empty() ) {
3242 get_map().clear_vehicle_point_from_cache( veh, part_pos );
3243 }
3244 }
3245 // This will be part of an NPC "job" where they need to clean up the acitivty items afterwards
3246 if( p.is_npc() ) {
3247 for( item &it : resulting_items ) {
3248 it.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
3249 }
3250 }
3251 // Finally, put all the results somewhere (we wanted to wait until this
3252 // point because we don't want to put them back into the vehicle part
3253 // that just got removed).
3254 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( p, item_drop_reason::deliberate, resulting_items );
3255 break;
3256 }
3257 }
3258 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3259}
